# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-105">준수 센터의 DLP(데이터 손실 방지)에는 DLP 정책에 사용할 준비가 된 많은 중요한 정보 유형이 포함되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-106">이 문서에서는 이러한 모든 중요한 정보 유형을 나열하고 DLP 정책이 각 유형을 검색할 때 검색하는 정보를 보여 제공합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-106">This article lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-107">중요한 정보 유형에 대한 자세한 내용은 중요한 정보 [유형을 참조하세요.](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-107">To learn more about sensitive information types, see [Sensitive information types](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-108">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-108">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-109">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-110">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-110">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-111">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-111">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-112">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-112">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-113">0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작 하는 네 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-113">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-114">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-114">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-115">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-116">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-116">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-117">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-117">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-118">무형: 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작하는 9자리 연속 자릿수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-118">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-119">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-120">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-120">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-121">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-122">정책은 300자 이내의 접근성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도 중간 정도의 신뢰를 가합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-122">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-123">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-123">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-124">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-124">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-125">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-125">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-126">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-126">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-135">americanbankassociationroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-135">americanbankassociationroutingnumber</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-140">라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-140">routing number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-141">routing transit number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-141">routing transit number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-142">라우팅 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-142">routing#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-143">RTN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-143">RTN</span></span>


## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-144">아르헨티나 국가 ID(DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-144">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-145">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-145">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-146">8자리 숫자(또는 기간이 없는 경우)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-146">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-147">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-147">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-148">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-148">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-149">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-149">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-150">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-150">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-151">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-151">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-152">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-152">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-153">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-153">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-154">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-154">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-155">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-155">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-156">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-156">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-157">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-157">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-158">정규식 Regex_argentina_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-158">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-159">검색된 Keyword_argentina_national_id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-159">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_argentina_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-161">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-161">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-164">cédula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-164">cédula</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-165">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-165">dni</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-166">documento nacional de identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-166">documento nacional de identidad</span></span>

## <a name="argentina-unique-tax-identification-key-cuitcuil"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-171">아르헨티나 고유 세금 식별 키(CUIT/CUIL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-171">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-172">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-172">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-173">대시가 있는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-173">Eleven digits with dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-174">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-174">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-175">대시가 있는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-175">Eleven digits with a dash:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-176">20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 또는 34의 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-176">two digits in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 or 34</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-177">하이픈(-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-177">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-178">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-178">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-179">하이픈(-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-179">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-180">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-180">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-181">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-182">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-182">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-183">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-184">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-184">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-185">이 `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-185">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-186">시작 `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-186">A keyword from `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-187">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-187">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-188">이 `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-188">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL) -->
      <Entity id="98da3da1-9199-4571-b7c4-b6522980b507" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-189">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-189">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_argentina_unique_tax_key"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-190">Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-190">Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-191">Clave Unica de Identificacion Tributaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-191">Clave Unica de Identificacion Tributaria</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-192">CUIT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-192">CUIT</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-194">Clave Única de Identificación Tributaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-194">Clave Única de Identificación Tributaria</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-227">호주 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-227">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-228">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-228">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-229">은행 주 분기 번호가 있는 경우 또는 없는 6-10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-229">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-230">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-230">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-231">계정 번호는 6자리에서 10자리까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-231">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-232">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-232">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-233">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-233">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-234">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-234">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-235">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-235">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-236">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-236">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-237">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-237">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-238">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-238">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-239">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-239">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-240">정규식 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-240">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-241">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-241">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-242">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-242">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-243">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-243">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-244">정규식 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-244">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-245">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-245">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-258">banking information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-258">banking information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-259">full names</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-259">full names</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-260">iaea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-260">iaea</span></span>

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-261">오스트레일리아 비즈니스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-261">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-262">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-262">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-263">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-263">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-264">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-264">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-265">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-265">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-266">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-266">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-267">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-267">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-268">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-269">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-269">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-270">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-271">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-271">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-272">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-272">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-273">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-273">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-274">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-274">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-275">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-275">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-276">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-276">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-277">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-277">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-278">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-278">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-279">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-280">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-280">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-281">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-282">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-282">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-283">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-283">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-284">검색된 Keywords_australian_business_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-284">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-285">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-285">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-286">이 Func_australian_business_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-286">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-289">australia business no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-289">australia business no</span></span>

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-296">오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-296">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-297">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-297">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-298">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-298">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-299">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-299">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-300">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-300">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-301">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-301">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-302">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-302">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-303">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-303">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-304">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-304">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-305">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-305">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-306">9자리 숫자(디지타이터)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-306">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-307">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-307">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-308">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-308">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-309">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-309">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-310">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-310">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-311">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-311">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-312">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-312">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-313">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-313">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-314">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-314">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-315">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-315">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-316">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-316">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-317">검색된 Keyword_Australian_Company_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-317">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-318">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-318">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-319">이 Func_Australian_Company_Number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-319">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-320">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-320">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_company_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-321">Keyword_australia_company_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-321">Keyword_australia_company_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-322">can</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-322">acn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-323">australia company no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-323">australia company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-324">australia company no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-324">australia company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-325">australia company number(오스트레일리아 회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-325">australia company number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-326">australian company no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-326">australian company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-327">australian company no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-327">australian company no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-328">australian company number(오스트레일리아 회사 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-328">australian company number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-329">호주 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-329">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-330">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-330">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-331">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-331">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-332">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-332">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-333">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-333">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-334">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-334">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-335">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-335">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-336">5자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-336">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-337">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-337">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-338">선택적 문자 1-2개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-338">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-339">4-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-339">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-340">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-340">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-341">9자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-341">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-342">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-342">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-343">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-343">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-344">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-344">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-345">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-345">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-346">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-346">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-347">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-347">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-348">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-348">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-448">오스트레일리아 의료 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-448">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-449">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-449">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-450">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-450">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-451">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-451">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-452">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-452">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-453">첫 번째 숫자는 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-453">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-454">9자리 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-454">Nine digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-455">10번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-455">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-456">11번째 숫자(선택 사항)는 개인 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-456">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-457">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-458">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-458">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-459">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-460">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-460">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-461">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-461">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-462">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-462">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-463">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-463">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-469">bank payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-469">bank payments</span></span>

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-475">호주 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-475">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-476">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-476">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-477">문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-477">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-478">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-478">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-479">문자(대소문자 구분 안 ) 다음에 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-479">A letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-480">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-481">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-481">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-482">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-483">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-483">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-484">Regex_australia_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-484">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-485">또는 Keyword_passport Keyword_australia_passport_number 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-485">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-519">오스트레일리아 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-519">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-520">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-520">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-521">8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-521">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-522">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-522">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-523">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백이 있는 8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-523">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-524">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-524">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-525">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-525">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-526">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-526">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-527">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-527">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-528">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-528">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-529">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-530">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-530">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-531">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-532">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-532">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-533">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-533">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-534">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-534">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-535">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-535">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-539">marginal tax rate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-539">marginal tax rate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-540">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-540">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-541">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-541">portfolio number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-542">service veterans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-542">service veterans</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-544">individual tax return</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-544">individual tax return</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-545">tax file number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-545">tax file number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-546">tfn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-546">tfn</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-547">오스트리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-547">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-548">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-548">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-549">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-549">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-550">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-550">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-551">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-551">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-552">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-552">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-553">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-553">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-554">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-554">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-555">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-555">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-556">`Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-556">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-557">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-557">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-684">오스트리아 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-684">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-685">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-685">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-686">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-686">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-687">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-687">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-688">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-688">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-689">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-689">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-690">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-690">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-691">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-691">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-692">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-692">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-693">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-693">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-694">24자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-694">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-695">22개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-695">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-696">두 글자(대/소문자 구분 안 ), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-696">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-697">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-698">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-698">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-699">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-700">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-700">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-701">`Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-701">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-702">시작  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-702">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-703">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-703">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-704">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-704">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-705">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-705">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-706">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-706">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-707">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-707">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-708">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-708">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-709">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-709">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-710">문자 1개, 선택적 공백 및 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-710">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-711">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-711">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-712">문자 1자, 숫자 7자 및 공백 1개 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-712">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-713">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-713">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-714">하나의 공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-714">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-715">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-715">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-716">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-716">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-717">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-717">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-718">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-718">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-719">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-719">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-720">`Regex_austria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-720">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-721">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-721">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-722">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-722">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-723">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-723">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-724">`Regex_austria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-724">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-725">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-725">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-737">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-737">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-738">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-738">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-749">오스트리아 사회 보장 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-749">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-750">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-750">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-751">지정된 형식의 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-751">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-752">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-752">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-753">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-753">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-754">일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-754">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-755">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-755">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-756">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-756">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-757">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-757">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-758">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-758">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-759">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-759">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-760">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-760">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-761">이  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-761">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-762">시작  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-762">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-763">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-763">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-764">이  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-764">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-790">오스트리아 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-790">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-791">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-791">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-792">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-792">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-793">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-793">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-794">선택적 하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-794">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-795">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-795">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-796">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-796">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-797">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-797">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-798">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-798">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-799">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-799">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-800">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-801">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-801">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-802">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-803">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-803">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-804">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-804">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-805">시작  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-805">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-806">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-806">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-807">이  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-807">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-820">에 대한 나타 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-820">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-821">일자 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-821">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-822">일자 수 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-822">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-823">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-823">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-824">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-824">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-825">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-825">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-826">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-826">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-827">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-827">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-828">tin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-828">tin#</span></span>

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-830">오스트리아 부가가치세</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-830">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-831">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-831">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-832">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-832">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-833">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-833">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-834">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-834">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-835">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-835">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-836">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-836">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-837">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-838">11자 영문 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-838">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-839">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-840">11자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-840">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-841">A 또는 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-841">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-842">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-842">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-843">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-843">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-844">U 또는 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-844">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-845">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-845">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-846">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-846">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-847">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-847">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-848">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-848">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-849">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-849">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-850">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-850">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-851">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-852">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-852">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-853">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-854">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-854">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-855">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-855">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-856">검색된 Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-856">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-857">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-857">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-858">이 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-858">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
