## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-876">Azure DocumentDB auth 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-876">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-877">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-877">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-878">문자열 "DocumentDb" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-878">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-879">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-879">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-880">문자열 "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-880">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-881">3~200자 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-881">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-882">기호(>), 등호(=), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-882">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-883">대문자 86자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-883">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-884">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-884">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-885">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-885">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-886">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-886">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-887">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-887">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-888">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-888">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-889">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-889">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-890">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-890">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-891">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-891">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-892">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-892">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-893">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-893">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-894">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-894">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-895">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-895">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-896">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-896">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-897">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-897">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-898">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-898">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-899">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-899">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-900">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-900">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-901">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-901">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-902">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-902">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-903">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-903">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-904">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-904">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-905">Azure IAAS 데이터베이스 연결 문자열 및 Azure SQL 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-905">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-906">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-907">문자열 "Server", "server", "data source" 다음에 문자열 "cloudapp.azure"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 추가됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-907">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-908">com" 또는 "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-908">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-909">net" 또는 "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-909">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-910">net", 문자열 "Password" 또는 "password" 또는 "pwd".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-910">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-911">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-911">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-912">문자열 "Server", "server" 또는 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-912">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-913">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-913">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-914">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-914">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-915">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-915">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-916">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-916">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-917">문자열 "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-917">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-918">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-918">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-919">net", "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-919">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-920">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-920">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-921">1에서 300 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-921">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-922">문자열 "Password", "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-922">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-923">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-923">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-924">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-924">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-925">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-925">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-926">세미콜론(;), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')가 아닌 하나 이상의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-926">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-927">세미코론(;), 인용 부호(") 또는 아포스트로피(')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-927">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-928">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-928">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-929">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-929">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-930">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-930">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-931">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-931">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-932">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-932">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-933">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-933">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-934">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-934">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-935">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-935">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-936">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-936">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-937">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-937">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-938">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-938">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-939">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-939">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-940">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-940">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-941">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-941">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-942">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-942">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-943">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-943">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-944">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-944">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-945">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-945">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-946">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-946">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-947">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-947">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-948">Azure IoT 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-948">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-949">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-949">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-950">문자열 "HostName" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열(문자열 "azure-devices")입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-950">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-951">net" 및 "SharedAccessKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-951">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-952">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-952">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-953">문자열 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-953">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-954">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-954">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-955">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-955">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-956">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-956">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-957">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-957">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-958">문자열 "azure-devices.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-958">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-959">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-959">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-960">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-960">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-961">문자열 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-961">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-962">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-962">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-963">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-963">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-964">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-964">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-965">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-965">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-966">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-966">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-967">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-967">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-968">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-968">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-969">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-969">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-970">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-970">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-971">정규식은 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-971">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-972">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-972">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-973">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-973">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-974">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-974">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-975">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-975">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-976">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-976">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-977">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-977">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-978">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-978">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-979">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-979">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-980">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-980">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-981">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-981">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-982">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-982">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-983">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-983">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-984">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-984">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-985">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-985">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-986">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-986">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-987">Azure 게시 설정 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-987">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-988">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-988">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-989">문자열 "userpwd=" 다음에 영문 문자열이 오게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-989">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-990">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-990">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-991">문자열 "userpwd="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-991">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-992">소문자 60자 또는 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-992">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-993">인용 부호(")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-993">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-994">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-994">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-995">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-995">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-996">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-996">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-997">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-997">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-998">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-998">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-999">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-999">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1000">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1000">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1001">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1001">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1005">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1005">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1006">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1006">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1007">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1007">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1008">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1008">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1009">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1009">127.0.0.1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1012">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1012">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1013">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1013">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1014">Azure Redis 캐시 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1014">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1015">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1016">문자열 "redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1016">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1017">net" 다음에 문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 표시됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1017">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1018">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1018">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1019">문자열 "redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1019">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1020">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1020">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1021">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1021">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1022">문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1022">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1023">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1023">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1024">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1024">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1025">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1025">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1026">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 43자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1026">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1027">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1027">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1028">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1028">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1029">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1029">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1030">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1030">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1031">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1031">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1032">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1032">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1033">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1033">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1046">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1046">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1047">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1047">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1048">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1048">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1049">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1049">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1050">문자열 "sig" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1050">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1051">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1051">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1052">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1052">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1053">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1053">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1054">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1054">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1055">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1055">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1056">대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호(%) 중 소문자 또는 대문자인 43-53자 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1056">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1057">문자열 "%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1057">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1058">대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호(%)가 아닌 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1058">any character that isn't a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1059">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1059">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1060">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1060">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1061">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1061">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1062">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1062">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1063">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1063">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1064">Azure 서비스 버스 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1064">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1065">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1066">문자열 "Servicebus.windows"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 이어지며 문자열 "EndPoint"가 그 다음에 오게 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1066">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1067">net" 및 "SharedAccesKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1067">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1068">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1068">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1069">문자열 "EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1069">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1070">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1070">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1071">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1071">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1072">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1072">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1073">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1073">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1074">문자열 "servicebus.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1074">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1075">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1075">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1076">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1076">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1077">문자열 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1077">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1078">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1078">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1079">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1079">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1080">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1080">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1081">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 43자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1081">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1082">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1082">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1083">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1083">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1084">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1084">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1085">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1085">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1086">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1086">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1087">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1087">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1088">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1088">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1089">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1089">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1090">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1090">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1091">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1091">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1092">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1092">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1093">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1093">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1094">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1094">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1095">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1095">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1096">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1096">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1097">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1097">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1098">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1098">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1099">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1099">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1100">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1100">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1101">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1101">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1102">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1102">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1103">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1103">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1104">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1104">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1105">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"에 문자열 "AccountKey"를 포함하여 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열이 이어지며</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1105">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1106">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1106">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1107">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1107">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1108">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1108">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1109">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1109">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1110">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1110">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1111">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1111">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1112">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1112">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1113">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1113">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1114">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1114">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1115">공백 문자 0-2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1115">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1116">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 86자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1116">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1117">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1117">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1118">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1119">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1119">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1120">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1121">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1121">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1122">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1122">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1123">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1123">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1124">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1124">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1125">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1125">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_azure_emulator_storage_account_filter"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1126">CEP_azure_emulator_storage_account_filter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1126">CEP_azure_emulator_storage_account_filter</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1127">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1127">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1128">Eby8vdM02xNOcqFlqUwJPLlmEtlCDXJ1OUzFT50uSRZ6IFsuFq2UVErCz4I6tq/K1SZFPTOtr/KBHBeksoGMGw==</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1128">Eby8vdM02xNOcqFlqUwJPLlmEtlCDXJ1OUzFT50uSRZ6IFsuFq2UVErCz4I6tq/K1SZFPTOtr/KBHBeksoGMGw==</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1129">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1129">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1130">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1130">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1131">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1131">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1132">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1132">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1133">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1133">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1134">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1134">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1135">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1135">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1136">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1136">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1137">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1137">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1138">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1138">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1139">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1139">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1140">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1140">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1141">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1141">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1142">Azure Storage 계정 키(일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1142">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1143">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1143">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1144">아래 패턴에 설명된 86개 이하 또는 대문자, 자릿수, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1144">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1145">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1145">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1146">기호(>), 아포스트로피('), 등호(=), 따로 표시(") 또는 숫자 기호(#) 중 하나까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1146">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1147">대문자, 숫자, 슬래시(/) 또는 더하기 기호(+)가 있는 86자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1147">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1148">등호 2개(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1148">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1149">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1150">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1150">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1151">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1152">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1152">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1153">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1153">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1154">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1154">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1155">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1155">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1156">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1156">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1157">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1157">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1158">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1158">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1159">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1160">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1160">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1161">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1162">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1162">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1163">`Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1163">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1164">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1164">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1297">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1297">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1298">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1298">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1299">11자리 숫자와 선택적분자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1299">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1300">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1300">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1301">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1301">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1302">YY 형식의 6자리 숫자와 2개의 선택적 기간 생년월일용 MM.DD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1302">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1303">점, 대시, 공백의 선택적 delimiter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1303">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1304">3개의 일직선 숫자(남성의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 홀수)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1304">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1305">점, 대시, 공백의 선택적 delimiter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1305">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1306">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1306">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1307">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1307">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1308">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1308">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1309">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1309">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1310">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1310">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1311">이 Func_belgium_national_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1311">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1312">검색된 Keyword_belgium_national_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1312">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1313">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1313">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1314">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1314">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1315">이 Func_belgium_national_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1315">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1316">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1316">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1375">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1375">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1376">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1377">2개의 문자와 공백이나 따로 6자리 숫자(공백 또는 따로 문자 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1377">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1378">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1379">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1379">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1380">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1381">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1381">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1382">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1382">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1383">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1384">`Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1384">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1385">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1385">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1386">정규식은 DD MM YY 형식의 날짜 또는 에서 키워드를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾을 수 `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1386">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1387">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1387">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1388">`Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1388">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1389">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1389">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1416">벨기에 부가가치 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1416">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1417">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1417">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1418">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1418">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1419">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1419">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1420">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1420">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1421">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1421">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1422">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1422">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1423">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1423">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1424">12자 영문 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1424">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1425">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1425">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1426">12자 영문 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1426">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1427">문자 B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1427">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1428">E 또는 e 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1428">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1429">숫자 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1429">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1430">1에서 9까지의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1430">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1431">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1431">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1432">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1432">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1433">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1433">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1434">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1434">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1435">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1435">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1436">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1436">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1437">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1437">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1438">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1438">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1439">이 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1439">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1440">검색된 Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1440">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1441">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1441">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1442">이 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1442">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1443">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1443">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1444">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1444">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1445">nº tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1445">nº tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1446">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1446">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1447">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1447">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1448">numéro t.v.a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1448">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1449">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1449">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1450">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1450">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1451">btw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1451">btw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1452">btw #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1452">btw#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1453">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1453">vat#</span></span>


## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1454">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1454">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1455">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1456">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1456">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1457">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1458">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1458">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1459">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1459">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1460">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1460">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1461">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1461">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1462">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1462">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1463">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1463">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1464">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1464">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1465">검사 숫자인 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1465">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1466">비형성:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1466">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1467">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1467">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1468">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1468">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1469">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1469">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1470">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1470">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1471">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1471">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1472">이 Func_brazil_cpf 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1472">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1473">검색된 Keyword_brazil_cpf 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1473">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1474">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1474">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1475">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1475">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1476">이 Func_brazil_cpf 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1476">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1477">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1477">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1478">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1478">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1479">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1479">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1480">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1480">CPF</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1481">Identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1481">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1482">Registration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1482">Registration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1483">수익</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1483">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1484">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1484">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1485">Imposto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1485">Imposto</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1486">Identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1486">Identificação</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1487">Inscrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1487">Inscrição</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1488">Receita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1488">Receita</span></span> 

   
## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1489">브라질 법인 번호(CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1489">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1490">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1490">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1491">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1491">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1492">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1492">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1493">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1493">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1494">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1494">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1495">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1495">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1496">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1496">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1497">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1497">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1498">3자리 숫자(처음 8자리 숫자는 등록 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1498">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1499">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1499">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1500">4자리 분기 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1500">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1501">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1501">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1502">검사 숫자인 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1502">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1503">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1503">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1504">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1504">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1505">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1505">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1506">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1506">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1507">이 Func_brazil_cnpj 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1507">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1508">검색된 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1508">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1509">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1509">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1510">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1510">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1511">이 Func_brazil_cnpj 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1511">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1512">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1512">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1523">Business</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1523">Business</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1524">Company</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1524">Company</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1530">Pessoas jurídicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1530">Pessoas jurídicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1531">Situação cadastral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1531">Situação cadastral</span></span>
