## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1534">브라질 국가 ID 카드(RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1534">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1535">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1535">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1536">Registro Geral(이전 형식): 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1536">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1537">Registro de Identidade(RIC)(새 형식): 11자리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1537">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1538">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1539">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1539">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1540">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1540">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1541">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1541">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1542">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1542">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1543">기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1543">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1544">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1544">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1545">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1545">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1546">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1546">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1547">Registro de Identidade(RIC)(새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1547">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1548">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1548">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1549">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1549">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1550">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1550">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1551">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1551">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1552">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1552">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1553">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1553">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1554">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1554">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1555">이 Func_brazil_rg 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1555">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1556">검색된 Keyword_brazil_rg 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1556">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1557">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1557">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1558">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1558">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1559">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1559">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1560">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1560">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1561">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1561">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1562">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1562">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1563">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1563">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1564">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1564">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1565">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1565">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1566">RG(이 키워드는 대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1566">RG (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1567">RIC(이 키워드는 대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1567">RIC (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1568">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1568">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1569">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1569">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1570">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1570">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1571">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1571">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1572">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1572">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1573">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1573">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1574">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1574">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1575">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1575">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1576">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1576">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1577">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1577">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1578">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1578">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1705">불가리아 유니폼 내선 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1705">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1706">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1706">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1707">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1707">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1708">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1708">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1709">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1709">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1710">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1710">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1711">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1711">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1712">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1712">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1713">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1713">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1714">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1714">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1715">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1715">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1716">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1716">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1717">생년월일 순서에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1717">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1718">성별에 해당하는 1자리 숫자: 남성의 10진수와 여성의 홀수 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1718">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1719">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1719">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1720">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1720">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1721">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1721">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1722">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1722">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1723">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1723">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1724">이  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1724">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1725">시작  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1725">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1726">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1726">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1727">이  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1727">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1772">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1772">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1773">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1773">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1774">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1774">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1775">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1775">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1776">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1776">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1777">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1777">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1778">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1778">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1779">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1779">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1780">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1780">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1781">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1781">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1782">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1782">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1783">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1783">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1784">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1784">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1785">`Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1785">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1786">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1786">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1787">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1787">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1788">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1788">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1789">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1789">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1790">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1790">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1791">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1791">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1792">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1792">passports</span></span>

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1806">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1806">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1807">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1807">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1808">7자리 또는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1808">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1809">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1809">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1810">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7자리 또는 12자리입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1810">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1811">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1811">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1812">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1812">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1813">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1813">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1814">3자리 숫자 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1814">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1815">0 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1815">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1816">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1816">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1817">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1817">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1818">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1818">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1819">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1819">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1820">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1820">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1821">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1821">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1822">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1822">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1823">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1823">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1824">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1824">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1825">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1825">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1826">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1826">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1850">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1850">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1851">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1851">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1852">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1852">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1853">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1853">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1854">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1854">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1855">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1855">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1856">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1856">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1857">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1857">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1858">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1858">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1859">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1859">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1860">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1860">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1861">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1861">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1997">캐나다 보건 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1997">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1998">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1998">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-1999">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-1999">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2000">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2000">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2001">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2001">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2002">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2002">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2003">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2003">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2004">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2004">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2005">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2005">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2006">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2006">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2007">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2007">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2008">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2008">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2010">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2010">personal health number</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2019">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2019">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2020">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2020">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2021">대문자 2자, 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2021">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2022">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2022">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2023">대문자 2자, 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2023">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2024">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2024">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2025">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2025">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2026">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2026">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2027">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2027">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2028">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2028">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2029">또는 Keyword_canada_passport_number Keyword_passport 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2029">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2030">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2030">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2059">캐나다 PHIN(개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2059">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2060">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2060">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2061">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2061">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2062">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2062">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2063">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2063">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2064">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2064">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2065">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2065">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2066">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2066">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2067">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2067">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2068">Regex_canada_phin 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2068">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2069">두 개 이상의 Keyword_canada_phin 또는 Keyword_canada_provinces 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2069">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2102">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2102">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2103">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2103">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2104">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백이 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2104">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2105">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2105">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2106">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2106">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2107">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2107">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2108">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2108">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2109">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2109">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2110">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2110">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2111">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2111">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2112">무형: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2112">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2113">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2113">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2114">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2114">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2115">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2115">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2116">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2116">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2117">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2117">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2118">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2118">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2119">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2119">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2120">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2120">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2121">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2121">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2122">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2122">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2123">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2123">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2124">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2124">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2125">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2125">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2126">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2126">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2151">칠레 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2151">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2152">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2152">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2153">7-8자리 숫자와 검사 숫자 또는 문자를 더한 값</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2153">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2154">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2154">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2155">7-8자리 숫자와 함께하는 데 10자리 숫자를 더한 값:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2155">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2156">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2156">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2157">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2157">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2158">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2158">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2159">선택적 기간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2159">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2160">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2160">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2161">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2161">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2162">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2162">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2163">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2164">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2164">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2165">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2166">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2166">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2167">이 Func_chile_id_card 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2167">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2168">검색된 Keyword_chile_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2168">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2169">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2170">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2170">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2171">이 Func_chile_id_card 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2171">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2172">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2172">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2209">중국 거주자 ID 카드(PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2209">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2210">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2210">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2211">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2211">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2212">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2212">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2213">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2213">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2214">주소 코드인 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2214">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2215">생년월일인 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2215">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2216">주문 코드인 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2216">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2217">검사 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2217">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2218">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2218">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2219">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2219">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2220">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2220">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2221">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2221">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2222">이 Func_china_resident_id 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2222">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2223">검색된 Keyword_china_resident_id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2223">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2224">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2224">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2225">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2225">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2226">이 Func_china_resident_id 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2226">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2227">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2227">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2240">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2240">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2241">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2241">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2242">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는(dddddd)될 수 있으며 Luhn 테스트를 통과해야 하는 14-16자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2242">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2243">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2243">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2244">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 기프트 카드 및 다이너 카드를 비롯한 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드의 카드를 감지하는 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2244">Complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2245">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2246">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2246">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2247">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2248">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2248">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2249">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2249">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2250">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2250">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2251">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2251">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2252">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2252">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2253">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2253">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2254">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2254">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2255">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2255">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2256">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2256">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2257">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2257">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2517">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2517">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2518">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2519">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2519">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2520">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2521">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2521">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2522">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2523">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2523">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2524">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2525">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2525">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2526">`Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2526">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2527">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2527">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2651">크로아티아 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2651">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2652">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2652">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2653">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2653">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2654">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2654">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2655">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2655">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2656">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2656">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2657">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2657">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2658">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2658">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2659">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2659">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2660">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2660">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2661">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2661">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2662">이 Func_croatia_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2662">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2663">검색된 Keyword_croatia_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2663">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2694">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2694">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2695">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2696">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2696">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2697">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2698">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2698">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2699">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2699">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2700">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2700">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2701">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2701">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2702">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2702">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2703">`Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2703">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2704">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2704">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2705">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2705">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2706">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2706">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2707">`Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2707">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2708">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2708">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2709">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2709">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2710">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2710">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2726">크로아티아 개인 식별(OIB) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2726">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2727">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2728">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2728">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2729">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2730">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2730">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2731">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2731">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2732">마지막 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2732">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2733">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2733">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2734">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2734">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2735">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2735">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2736">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2736">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2737">이 Func_croatia_oib_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2737">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2738">검색된 Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2738">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2739">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2739">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2740">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2740">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2741">이 Func_croatia_oib_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2741">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2742">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2742">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2773">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2773">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2774">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2774">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2775">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2775">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2776">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2776">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2777">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2777">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2778">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2778">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2779">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2779">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2780">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2780">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2781">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2781">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2782">`Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2782">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2783">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2783">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2908">키프로스 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2908">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2909">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2909">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2910">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2910">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2911">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2911">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2912">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2912">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2913">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2913">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2914">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2914">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2915">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2915">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2916">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2916">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2917">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2917">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2918">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2918">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2919">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2919">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2920">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2920">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2921">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2921">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2922">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2922">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2923">`Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2923">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2924">시작  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2924">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2925">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2925">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2926">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2926">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2927">id card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2927">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2928">ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2928">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2929">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2929">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2930">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2930">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2931">개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2931">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2932">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2932">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2933">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2933">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2934">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2934">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2935">1개 문자와 공백이나 따로 6-8자리 숫자(공백 또는 따로 문자 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2935">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2936">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2936">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2937">1개의 문자와 6-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2937">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2938">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2938">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2939">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2939">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2940">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2940">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2941">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2941">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2942">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2942">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2943">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2943">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2944">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD/MM/YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2944">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2945">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2945">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2946">`Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2946">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2947">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2947">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
