## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2976">키프로스 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2976">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2977">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2977">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2978">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2978">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2979">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2979">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2980">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2980">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2981">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2981">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2982">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2982">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2983">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2984">지정된 패턴의 8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2984">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2985">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2986">8자리 숫자와 문자 1자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2986">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2987">"0" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2987">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2988">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2988">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2989">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2989">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2990">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2990">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2991">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2991">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2992">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2993">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2993">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2994">이  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2994">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2995">시작  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2995">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2996">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2996">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2997">이  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2997">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2998">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2998">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-2999">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-2999">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3014">tic #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3014">tic#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3015">tic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3015">tic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3016">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3016">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3017">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3017">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3018">tin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3018">tin#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3020">vergi kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3020">vergi kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3021">αριθμός φορολογικού μητρώου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3021">αριθμός φορολογικού μητρώου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3022">κωδικός φορολογικού μητρώου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3022">κωδικός φορολογικού μητρώου</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3024">φορολογικού κωδικού</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3024">φορολογικού κωδικού</span></span>


## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3025">체코 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3025">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3026">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3026">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3027">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3027">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3028">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3028">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3029">8개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3029">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3030">'E' 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3030">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3031">문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3031">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3032">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3032">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3033">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3033">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3034">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3034">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3035">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3035">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3036">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3036">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3037">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3037">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3038">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3038">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3039">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3039">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3164">čísla řidičských průkazů</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3164">čísla řidičských průkazů</span></span>


## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3165">체코 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3165">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3166">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3167">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3167">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3168">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3169">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3169">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3170">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3170">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3171">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3171">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3172">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3172">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3173">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3173">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3174">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3174">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3175">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3175">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3176">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3176">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3177">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3177">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3178">`Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3178">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3179">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3179">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3201">체코 개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3201">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3202">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3202">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3203">선택적 슬래시(이전 형식)가 있는 9자리 숫자(선택적 슬래시(새 형식)가 있는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3203">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3204">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3204">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3205">9자리 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3205">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3206">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3206">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3207">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3207">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3208">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3208">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3209">10자리 숫자(새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3209">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3210">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3210">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3211">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3211">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3212">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3212">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3213">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3213">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3214">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3214">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3215">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3215">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3216">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3216">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3217">이 Func_czech_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3217">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3218">검색된 Keyword_czech_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3218">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3219">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3219">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3220">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3220">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3221">이 Func_czech_id_card_new_format 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3221">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3222">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3222">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3269">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3269">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3270">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3270">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3271">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3271">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3272">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3272">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3273">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3273">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3274">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3275">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3275">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3276">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3277">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3277">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3278">`Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3278">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3279">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3279">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3403">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3403">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3404">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3405">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3405">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3406">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3407">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3407">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3408">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3408">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3409">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3409">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3410">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3410">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3411">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3411">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3412">`Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3412">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3413">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3413">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3414">정규식이 DD MM YY 형식의 날짜 또는 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` 검색한 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3414">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3415">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3415">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3416">`Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3416">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3417">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3417">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3437">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3437">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3438">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3438">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3439">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3439">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3440">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3440">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3441">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3441">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3442">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3442">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3443">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3443">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3444">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3444">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3445">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3446">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3446">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3447">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3448">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3448">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3449">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3449">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3450">검색된 Keyword_denmark_id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3450">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3451">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3451">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3452">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3452">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3453">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3453">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3454">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3454">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3526">DEA(마약 집행 기구) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3526">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3527">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3527">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3528">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3528">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3529">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3529">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3530">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3530">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3531">등록자 코드인 abcdefghjklmnprstux와 같은 가능한 문자 집합에서 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 )를 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3531">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3532">한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 )는 등록 기관의 성 또는 숫자 '9'의 첫 번째 문자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3532">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3533">7자리 숫자( 마지막 숫자는 검사 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3533">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3534">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3534">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3535">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3535">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3536">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3536">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3537">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3537">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3538">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3538">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3539">키워드를 `Keyword_dea_number` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3539">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3540">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3540">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3541">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3541">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3542">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3542">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3543">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3543">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3544">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3544">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3545">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3545">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3546">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3546">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3547">dea #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3547">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3548">마약 집행 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3548">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3549">마약 집행 기관</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3549">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3550">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3550">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3551">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3551">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3552">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3552">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3553">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3553">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3554">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3554">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3555">문자 "ET"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3555">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3556">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3556">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3557">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3557">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3558">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3558">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3559">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3559">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3560">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3560">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3561">`Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3561">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3562">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3562">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3688">에스토니아 개인 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3688">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3689">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3690">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3691">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3692">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3693">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3694">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3695">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3696">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3696">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3697">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3698">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3698">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3699">성 및 생년월일(홀수 남성, 1-2세대, 19세, 3-4: 20 세기, 5-6: 21 세기)에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3699">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3700">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3700">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3701">같은 날짜에 태어나는 사람을 구분하는 일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3701">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3702">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3702">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3703">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3704">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3704">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3705">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3706">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3707">이  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3707">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3708">시작  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3708">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3709">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3709">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3710">이  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3710">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3712">Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3712">Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3713">id-kaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3713">id-kaart</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3714">ik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3714">ik</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3743">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3743">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3744">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3745">공백이나 따로 7자리 숫자를 입력하고 공백이나 따로 문자를 1개씩 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3745">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3746">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3747">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3747">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3748">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3749">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3749">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3750">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3751">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3751">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3752">`Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3752">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3753">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3753">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3754">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3754">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3755">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3755">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3756">`Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3756">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3757">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3757">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3775">유럽 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3775">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3776">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3776">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3777">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3777">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3778">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3778">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3779">복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3779">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3780">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3780">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3781">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3781">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3782">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3782">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3783">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3783">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3784">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3784">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3785">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3785">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3786">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3786">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3787">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3787">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3788">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3788">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3789">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3789">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3790">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3790">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-3791">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-3791">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4238">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4238">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4239">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4239">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4240">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4240">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4241">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4241">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4242">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4242">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4243">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4243">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4244">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4244">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4245">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4245">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4246">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4246">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4247">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4248">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4248">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4249">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4250">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4250">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4251">`Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4251">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4252">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4252">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4383">핀란드 유럽 의료 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4383">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4384">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4384">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4385">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4385">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4386">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4386">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4387">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4387">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4388">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4388">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4389">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4389">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4390">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4390">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4391">20자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4391">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4392">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4392">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4393">20자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4393">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4394">10자리 숫자 - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4394">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4395">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4395">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4396">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4396">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4397">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4397">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4398">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4398">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4399">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4399">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4400">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4400">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4401">regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4401">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4402">검색된 Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4402">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4420">핀란드 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4420">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4421">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4421">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4422">6자리 숫자와 세 번째 숫자와 검사 숫자를 나타내는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4422">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4423">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4423">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4424">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4424">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4425">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4425">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4426">century 마커('-', '+' 또는 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4426">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4427">3자리 개인식별번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4427">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4428">검사 숫자인 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 미지정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4428">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4429">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4430">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4430">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4431">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4432">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4432">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4433">함수가 Func_finnish_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4433">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4434">검색된 Keyword_finnish_national_id 발견</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4434">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4435">체크 체크 um 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4435">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4436">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4437">함수가 Func_finnish_national_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4437">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4438">체크 체크 um 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4438">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4487">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4487">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4488">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4488">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4489">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4489">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4490">9개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4490">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4491">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4491">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4492">9개의 문자 및 숫자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4492">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4493">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4493">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4494">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4494">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4495">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4495">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4496">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4496">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4497">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4497">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4498">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4498">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4499">`Regex_finland_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4499">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4500">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4500">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4501">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4501">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4502">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4502">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4503">`Regex_finland_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4503">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4504">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4504">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4505">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4505">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_finland_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4517">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4517">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4518">suomalainen passi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4518">suomalainen passi</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4527">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4527">date of expiry</span></span>

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4528">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4528">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4529">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4529">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4530">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4531">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4531">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4532">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4533">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4533">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4534">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4534">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4535">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4535">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4536">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4536">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4537">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4537">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4538">함수가 Func_french_drivers_license 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4538">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4539">검색된 Keyword_french_drivers_license 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4539">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4662">license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4662">license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4663">licence numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4663">licence numbers</span></span>

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4666">프랑스 의료 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4666">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4667">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4667">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4668">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4668">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4669">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4669">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4670">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4670">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4671">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4671">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4672">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4672">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4673">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4673">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4674">21자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4674">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4675">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4675">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4676">21자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4676">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4677">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4677">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4678">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4678">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4679">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4679">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4680">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4680">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4681">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4681">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4682">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4682">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4683">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4683">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4684">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4684">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4685">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4685">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4686">regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4686">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4687">검색된 Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4687">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4688">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4688">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4689">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4689">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4690">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4690">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4691">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4691">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4692">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4692">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4693">프랑스 국가 ID 카드(CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4693">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4694">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4695">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4695">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4696">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4696">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4697">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4697">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4698">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4698">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4699">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4699">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4700">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4700">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4701">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4701">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4702">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4702">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4703">검색된 Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4703">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4704">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4704">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4705">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4705">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>
