- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4708">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4708">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4709">cni #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4709">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4710">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4710">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4711">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4711">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4712">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4712">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4713">national identity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4713">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4714">nationalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4714">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4715">numéro d'assurance maladie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4715">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4716">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4716">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4717">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4717">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4718">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에서 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4718">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4719">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4719">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4720">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4720">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4721">9자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4721">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4722">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4722">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4723">9자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4723">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4724">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4724">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4725">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4725">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4726">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4726">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4727">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4727">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4728">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4728">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4729">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4729">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4730">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4730">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4731">이 `Func_fr_passport` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4731">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4732">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4732">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4733">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4733">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4734">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4734">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4735">이 `Func_fr_passport` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4735">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4736">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4736">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4737">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4737">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4745">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4745">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4746">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4746">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4747">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4747">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4748">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4748">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4749">Keywords_france_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4749">Keywords_france_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4750">numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4750">numéro de passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4751">passeport n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4751">passeport n °</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4752">passeport non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4752">passeport non</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4753">passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4753">passeport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4754">passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4754">passeport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4755">passeportnon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4755">passeportnon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4756">passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4756">passeportn °</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4757">passeport français</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4757">passeport français</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4758">passeport livre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4758">passeport livre</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4759">passeport carte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4759">passeport carte</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4765">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4765">date of issue</span></span>

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4767">프랑스 사회 보장 번호(INSEE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4767">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4768">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4768">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4769">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4769">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4770">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4770">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4771">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4771">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4772">13자리 숫자, 공백, 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4772">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4773">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4773">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4774">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4774">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4775">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4775">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4776">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4776">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4777">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4777">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4778">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4778">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4779">이 `Func_french_insee` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4779">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4780">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4780">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4781">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4781">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4782">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4782">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4783">이 Func_french_insee Func_fr_insee 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4783">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4784">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4784">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

no. d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-p134">no. d'identite</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4815">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4815">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4816">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4816">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4817">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4817">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4818">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4818">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4819">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4819">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4820">0, 1, 2 또는 3이 되어야 하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4820">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4821">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4821">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4822">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4822">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4823">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4823">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4824">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4824">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4825">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4825">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4826">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4826">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4827">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4827">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4828">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4828">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4829">검사 숫자 3개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4829">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4830">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4830">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4831">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4831">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4832">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4832">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4833">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4833">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4834">이  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4834">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4835">시작  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4835">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4836">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4836">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4837">이  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4837">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4838">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4838">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4839">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4839">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4840">numéro d'identification 회계</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4840">numéro d'identification fiscale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4841">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4841">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4842">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4842">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4843">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4843">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4844">tax no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4844">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4845">tax no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4845">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4846">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4846">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4847">tax registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4847">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4848">에 대한 나타 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4848">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4849">일자 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4849">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4850">일자 수 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4850">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4851">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4851">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4852">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4852">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4853">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4853">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4854">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4854">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4855">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4855">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4856">tin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4856">tin#</span></span>


## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4857">프랑스 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4857">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4858">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4858">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4859">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4859">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4860">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4860">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4861">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4861">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4862">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4862">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4863">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4863">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4864">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4864">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4865">영문자 13자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4865">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4866">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4866">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4867">영문자 13자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4867">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4868">두 글자 - FR(대소문자 미지정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4868">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4869">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4869">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4870">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4870">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4871">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4871">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4872">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4872">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4873">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4873">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4874">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4874">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4875">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4875">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4876">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4876">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4877">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4877">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4878">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4878">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4879">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4879">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4880">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4880">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4881">이 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4881">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4882">검색된 Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4882">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4883">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4883">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4884">이 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4884">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4897">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4897">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4898">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4898">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4899">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4899">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4900">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4900">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4901">11자리 숫자와 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4901">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4902">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4902">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4903">11자리 숫자 및 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 됨):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4903">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4904">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4904">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4905">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4905">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4906">6자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4906">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4907">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4907">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4908">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4908">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4909">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4910">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4910">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4911">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4912">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4912">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4913">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4913">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4914">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4914">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-4915">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-4915">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5064">독일 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5064">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5065">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5066">2010년 11월 1일: 9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5066">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5067">1987년 4월 1일부터 2010년 10월 31일까지: 10자리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5067">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5068">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5068">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5069">2010년 11월 1일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5069">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5070">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5070">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5071">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5071">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5072">1987년 4월 1일부터 2010년 10월 31일까지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5072">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5073">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5073">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5074">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5075">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5075">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5076">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5077">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5077">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5078">정규식 Regex_germany_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5078">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5079">검색된 Keyword_germany_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5079">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5094">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5094">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5095">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5095">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5096">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5096">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5097">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5097">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5098">10자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5098">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5099">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5099">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5100">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5100">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5101">첫 문자는 이 집합의 숫자 또는 문자(C, F, G, H, J, K)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5101">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5102">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5102">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5103">이 집합의 5자리 숫자 또는 문자(C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5103">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5104">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5104">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5105">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5105">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5106">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5106">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5107">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5107">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5108">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5108">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5109">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5109">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5110">키워드를 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5110">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5111">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5111">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5112">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5112">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5113">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5113">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5114">키워드를 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5114">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5115">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5115">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5128">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5128">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5129">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5129">passport #</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5138">독일 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5138">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5139">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5139">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5140">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5140">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5141">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5141">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5142">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5142">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5143">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5143">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5144">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5144">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5145">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5145">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5146">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5146">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5147">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5147">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5148">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5148">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5149">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5149">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5150">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5150">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5151">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5152">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5152">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5153">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5154">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5154">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5155">이  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5155">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5156">시작  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5156">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5157">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5157">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5158">이  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5158">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5159">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5159">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5160">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5160">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5161">identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5161">identifikationsnummer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5163">steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5163">steueridentifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5164">steuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5164">steuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5165">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5165">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5166">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5166">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5167">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5167">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5168">tax no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5168">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5169">tax no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5169">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5170">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5170">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5171">tax registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5171">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5172">에 대한 나타 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5172">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5173">일자 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5173">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5174">일자 수 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5174">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5175">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5175">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5176">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5176">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5177">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5177">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5178">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5178">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5179">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5179">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5180">tin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5180">tin#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5181">zinn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5181">zinn#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5183">zinnnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5183">zinnnummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5184">독일 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5184">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5185">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5185">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5186">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5186">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5187">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5187">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5188">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5188">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5189">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5189">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5190">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5190">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5191">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5192">영문자 11자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5192">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5193">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5193">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5194">11자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5194">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5195">문자 D 또는 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5195">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5196">E 또는 e 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5196">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5197">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5197">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5198">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5198">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5199">선택적 공백 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5199">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5200">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5200">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5201">선택적 공백 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5201">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5202">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5202">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5203">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5204">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5204">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5205">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5206">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5206">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5207">이 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5207">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5208">검색된 Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5208">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5209">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5209">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5210">이 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5210">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5211">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5211">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5212">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5212">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5213">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5213">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5214">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5214">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5215">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5215">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5216">vat# mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5216">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5217">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5217">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5218">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5218">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5219">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5219">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5220">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5220">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5221">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5221">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5222">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5222">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5223">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5223">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5224">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5224">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5225">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5225">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5226">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5226">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5227">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5227">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5228">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5228">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5229">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5229">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5230">`Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5230">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5231">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5231">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5357">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5357">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5358">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5358">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5359">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5359">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5360">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5360">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5361">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5361">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5362">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5362">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5363">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5363">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5364">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5364">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5365">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5365">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5366">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5366">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5367">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5367">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5368">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5368">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5369">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5369">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5370">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5370">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5371">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5371">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5372">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5372">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5373">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5373">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5374">검색된 Keyword_greece_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5374">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5375">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5375">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5376">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5376">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5377">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5377">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5378">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5378">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5379">그리스어 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5379">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5380">그리스어 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5380">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5381">그리스어 개인 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5381">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5382">그리스어 경찰 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5382">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5383">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5383">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5384">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5384">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5385">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5385">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5386">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5386">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5387">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5387">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5388">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5389">문자 2개와 공백이나 따로 7자리 숫자(공백이나 따로 문자 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5389">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5390">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5391">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5391">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5392">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5392">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5393">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5393">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5394">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5394">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5395">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5395">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5396">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5396">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5397">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5397">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5398">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM YY(예 - 28 8월 19일) 형식의 날짜 또는 키워드를 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5398">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5399">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5399">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5400">`Regex_greece_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5400">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5401">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5401">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5402">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5402">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5403">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5403">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5404">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5404">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5405">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5405">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5406">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5406">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5407">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5407">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5408">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5408">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5409">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5409">passport no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5417">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5417">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5418">그리스 AMKA(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5418">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5419">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5419">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5420">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5420">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5421">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5421">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5422">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5422">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5423">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5423">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5424">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5424">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5425">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5426">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5426">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5427">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5427">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5428">YYMMDD 생년월일로 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5428">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5429">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5429">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5430">검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5430">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5431">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5431">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5432">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5432">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5433">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5433">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5434">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5434">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5435">이  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5435">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5436">시작  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5436">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5437">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5437">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5438">이  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5438">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5439">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5439">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5449">그리스 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5449">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5450">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5450">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5451">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5451">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5452">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5452">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5453">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5453">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5454">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5454">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5455">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5455">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5456">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5456">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5457">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5457">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5458">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5458">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5459">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5459">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5460">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5460">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5461">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5461">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5462">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5462">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5463">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5463">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5464">`Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5464">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5465">시작  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5465">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5494">HKID(홍콩 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5494">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5495">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5495">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5496">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5496">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5497">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5497">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5498">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5498">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5499">1-2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5499">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5500">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5500">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5501">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5501">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5502">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5503">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5503">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5504">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5505">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5505">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5506">이 Func_hong_kong_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5506">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5507">검색된 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5507">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5508">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5508">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5509">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5509">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5510">이 Func_hong_kong_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5510">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5511">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5511">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5551">헝가리 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5551">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5552">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5552">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5553">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5553">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5554">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5554">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5555">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5555">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5556">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5556">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5557">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5557">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5558">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5558">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5559">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5559">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5560">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5560">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5561">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5561">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5562">`Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5562">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5563">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5563">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
