## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5688">헝가리 개인식별번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5688">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5689">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5690">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5691">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5692">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5693">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5694">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5695">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5696">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5696">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5697">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5698">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5698">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5699">성별에 해당하는 1자리 숫자(1900년 이전의 시민 또는 시민권이 2배인 시민의 경우 1-남성, 2-여성, 기타 숫자도 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5699">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5700">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5700">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5701">일련 번호에 해당하는 3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5701">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5702">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5702">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5703">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5704">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5704">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5705">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5706">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5707">이  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5707">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5708">시작  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5708">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5709">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5709">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5710">이  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5710">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5721">헝가리 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5721">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5722">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5723">2개의 문자와 공백이나 따로 7자리 숫자(공백이나 따로 문자 없음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5723">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5724">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5725">2개의 문자와 6-7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5725">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5726">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5727">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5727">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5728">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5729">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5729">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5730">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5730">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5731">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5731">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5732">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YY(예 - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5732">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5733">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5734">`Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5734">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5735">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5735">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5755">헝가리 TAJ(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5755">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5756">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5757">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5757">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5758">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5759">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5759">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5760">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5760">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5761">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5761">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5762">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5762">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5763">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5763">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5764">이  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5764">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5765">시작  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5765">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5766">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5766">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5767">이  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5767">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5787">헝가리 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5787">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5788">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5788">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5789">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5789">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5790">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5790">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5791">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5791">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5792">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5792">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5793">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5793">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5794">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5795">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5795">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5796">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5797">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5797">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5798">"8"이 되어야 하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5798">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5799">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5799">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5800">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5800">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5801">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5802">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5802">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5803">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5804">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5804">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5805">이  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5805">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5806">시작  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5806">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5807">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5808">이  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5808">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5809">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5809">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5810">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5810">Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5811">adóazonosító szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5811">adóazonosító szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5812">adóhatóság szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5812">adóhatóság szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5813">adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5813">adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5814">헝가리어 주석</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5814">hungarian tin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5815">hungatiantin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5815">hungatiantin#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5816">tax authority no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5816">tax authority no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5817">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5817">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5818">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5818">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5819">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5819">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5820">tax no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5820">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5821">tax no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5821">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5822">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5822">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5823">tax registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5823">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5824">에 대한 나타 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5824">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5825">일자 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5825">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5826">일자 수 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5826">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5827">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5827">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5828">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5828">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5829">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5829">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5830">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5830">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5831">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5831">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5832">tin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5832">tin#</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5834">헝가리 부가가치 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5834">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5835">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5835">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5836">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5836">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5837">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5837">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5838">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5838">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5839">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5839">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5840">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5840">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5841">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5842">영문자 10자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5842">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5843">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5844">영문자 10자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5844">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5845">두 글자 - HU 또는 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5845">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5846">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5846">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5847">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5847">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5848">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5848">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5849">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5849">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5850">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5850">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5851">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5851">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5852">이 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5852">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5853">검색된 Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5853">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5854">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5854">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5855">이 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5855">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5856">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5856">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5857">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5857">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5858">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5858">vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5859">부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5859">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5860">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5860">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5861">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5861">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5862">hungarianvatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5862">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5863">tax no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5863">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5864">value added tax áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5864">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5865">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5865">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5866">általános forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5866">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5867">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5867">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5868">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5868">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5869">인도 PAN(영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5869">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5870">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5870">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5871">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5871">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5872">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5872">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5873">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5873">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5874">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5874">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5875">C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G의 문자(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5875">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5876">문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5876">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5877">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5877">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5878">알파벳 검사 숫자인 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5878">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5879">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5879">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5880">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5880">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5881">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5881">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5882">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5882">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5883">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5883">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5884">검색된 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5884">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5885">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5885">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5886">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5886">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5887">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5887">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5888">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5888">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5889">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5889">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5890">PAN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5890">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5891">인도 고유 ID(Aadhaar) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5891">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5892">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5892">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5893">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5893">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5894">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5894">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5895">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5895">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5896">0 또는 1이 아닌 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5896">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5897">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5897">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5898">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5898">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5899">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5899">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5900">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5900">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5901">검사 숫자인 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5901">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5902">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5902">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5903">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5903">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5904">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5904">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5905">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5905">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5906">이 Func_india_aadhaar 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5906">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5907">검색된 Keyword_india_aadhar 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5907">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5908">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5908">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5909">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5909">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5910">이 Func_india_aadhaar 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5910">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5911">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5911">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5912">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5912">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5913">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5913">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5920">인도네시아 ID 카드(KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5920">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5921">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5922">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5922">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5923">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5924">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5924">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5925">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5925">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5926">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5926">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5927">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5927">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5928">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5928">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5929">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5929">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5930">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5930">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5931">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5931">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5932">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5932">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5933">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5933">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5934">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5934">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5935">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5935">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5936">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5936">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5937">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5937">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5938">검색된 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5938">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5939">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5939">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5940">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5940">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5941">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5941">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5942">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5942">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5943">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5943">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5944">IBAN(국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5944">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5945">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5945">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5946">국가 코드(2문자) 및 검사 숫자(2자리) 및 bban 번호(최대 30자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5946">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5947">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5947">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5948">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5948">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5949">2문자 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5949">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5950">검사 숫자 2개(선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5950">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5951">4개의 문자 또는 숫자로 1-7개 그룹(공백으로 구분할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5951">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5952">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5952">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5953">각 국가에 대한 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5953">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5954">IBAN 중요한 정보 유형은 다음 60개 국가에 해당합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5954">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5955">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5955">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5956">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5956">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5957">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5957">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5958">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5958">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5959">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5959">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5960">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5960">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5961">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5961">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5962">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5962">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5963">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5963">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5964">국제질병 분류(ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5964">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5965">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5965">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5966">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5966">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5967">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5967">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5968">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5968">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5969">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5969">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5970">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5970">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5971">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5971">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5972">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5972">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5973">검색된 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5973">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5974">검색된 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5974">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5975">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5975">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5976">업데이트된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5976">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5977">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5977">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5978">ICD-Dictionary_icd_10_updated 국제질병 [분류, 10번째 수정, ICD-10-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5978">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5979">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5979">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5980">ICD-Dictionary_icd_10_codes 국제질병 [분류, 10번째 수정, ICD-10-CM(예방 수정)를](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5980">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5981">이 유형은 설명이 아닌 보험 코드만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5981">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5982">국제적인 병 분류(ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5982">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5983">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5984">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5984">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5985">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5986">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5986">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5987">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5987">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5988">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5988">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5989">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5989">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5990">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5990">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5991">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5991">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5992">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5992">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5993">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5994">검색된 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5994">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5995">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5995">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5996">[ICD-9-CM(International Classification of Diseases,N9th Revision, ICD-9-CM)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5996">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5997">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5997">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5998">ICD-Dictionary_icd_9_codes 국제질병 [분류, 9번째 수정, ICD-9-CM(예방 수정)을](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)기반으로 하는 키워드 사전의 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5998">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-5999">이 유형은 설명이 아닌 보험 코드만 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-5999">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6000">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6000">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6001">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6001">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6002">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6002">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6003">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는(기간) 및 서식 없는 버전(기간 없음)을 계정으로 표시하는 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6003">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6004">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6004">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6005">서식이 있는 IPv6 번호(콜론 포함)를 계정을 표시하는 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6005">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6006">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6006">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6007">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6007">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6008">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6008">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6009">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6009">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6010">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6010">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6011">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6011">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6012">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6012">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6013">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6013">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6014">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6014">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6015">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6015">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6016">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6016">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6017">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6017">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6018">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6018">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6019">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6019">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6020">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6020">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6021">IP(이 키워드는 대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6021">IP (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6022">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6022">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6023">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6023">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6024">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6024">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6025">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6025">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6026">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6026">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6027">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6027">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6028">6자리 숫자와 문자 4자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6028">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6029">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6029">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6030">6자리 숫자와 4자리 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6030">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6031">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6031">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6032">4개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6032">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6033">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6033">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6034">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6034">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6035">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6035">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6036">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6036">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6037">`Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6037">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6038">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6038">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6162">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6162">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6163">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6164">공백이나 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6164">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6165">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6166">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6166">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6167">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6167">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6168">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6168">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6169">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6170">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6170">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6171">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6172">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6172">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6173">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6173">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6174">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6174">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6175">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date`정규식은 DD MMM/MMM YYYY(예제 - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) 형식의 날짜 또는 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6175">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6176">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6176">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6177">`Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6177">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6178">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6178">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6202">아일랜드 PPS(개인 공용 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6202">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6203">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6204">이전 형식(2012년 12월 31일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6204">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6205">7자리 숫자와 1-2자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6205">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6206">새 형식(2013년 1월 1일 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6206">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6207">7자리 숫자와 문자 2자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6207">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6208">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6208">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6209">이전 형식(2012년 12월 31일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6209">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6210">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6210">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6211">1-2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6211">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6212">새 형식(2013년 1월 1일 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6212">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6213">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6213">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6214">알파벳 검사 숫자인 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6214">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6215">A-I 범위의 선택적 문자 또는 "W"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6215">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6216">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6217">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6217">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6218">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6219">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6219">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6220">이 Func_ireland_pps 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6220">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6221">검색된 Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6221">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6222">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6222">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6223">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6223">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6224">이 Func_ireland_pps 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6224">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6225">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6225">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6270">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6270">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6271">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6271">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6272">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6272">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6273">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6273">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6274">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6274">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6275">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6275">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6276">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6276">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6277">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6277">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6278">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6278">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6279">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6279">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6280">비형성:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6280">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6281">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6281">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6282">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6282">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6283">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6283">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6284">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6284">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6285">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6285">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6286">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6286">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6287">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6287">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6288">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6288">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6289">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6289">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6290">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6290">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6291">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6291">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6292">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6292">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6293">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6293">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6294">이스라엘 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6294">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6295">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6295">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6296">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6296">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6297">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6297">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6298">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6298">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6299">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6299">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6300">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6300">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6301">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6301">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6302">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6302">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6303">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6303">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6304">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6304">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6305">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6305">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6306">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6306">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6307">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6307">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6308">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6308">מספר זהות</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6309">מספר זיה וי</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6309">מספר זיה וי</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6310">מספר זיהוי ישר אלי</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6310">מספר זיהוי ישר אלי</span></span>      
-   <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6311">זהותישר אלית</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6311">זהותישר אלית</span></span>
