## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6324">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6324">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6325">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 운전 면허 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함되어 있으며 독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6325">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6326">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6326">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6327">10자리 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6327">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6328">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6328">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6329">10자리 문자와 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6329">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6330">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6330">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6331">문자 "A" 또는 "V"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6331">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6332">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6332">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6333">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6333">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6334">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6334">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6335">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6335">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6336">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6336">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6337">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6337">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6338">`Regex_italy_drivers_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6338">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6339">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6339">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6466">이탈리아 회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6466">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6467">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6467">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6468">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6468">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6469">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6469">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6470">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6470">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6471">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6471">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6472">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6472">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6473">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6474">지정된 패턴의 문자 및 숫자 조합 16자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6474">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6475">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6475">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6476">문자와 숫자의 16자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6476">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6477">가족 이름의 처음 세 자석에 해당하는 3개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6477">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6478">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자석에 해당하는 세 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6478">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6479">생년월일의 마지막 숫자에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6479">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6480">생년월일 문자에 해당하는 한 문자- 문자는 사전순으로 사용되지만 A에서 E, H, L, M, P, R에서 T까지의 문자만 사용됩니다(따라서 1월은 A, 10월은 R임).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6480">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6481">성별을 차별화하기 위해 생년월일에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자는 여성의 생년월일에 40이 추가됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6481">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6482">사람이 태어나는 지역 번호에 해당하는 4자리 숫자(국가 전체 코드가 외국 국가에 사용)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6482">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6483">패리티 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6483">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6484">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6485">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6485">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6486">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6487">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6488">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6488">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6489">시작  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6489">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6490">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6490">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6491">이  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6491">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6526">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6526">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6527">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6527">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6528">공백이나 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자와 문자 2자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6528">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6529">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6529">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6530">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6530">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6531">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6531">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6532">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6532">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6533">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6533">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6534">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6534">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6535">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6535">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6536">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6536">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6537">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6537">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6538">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6538">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6539">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_date`정규식은 DD MMM/MMM YYYY(예제 - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) 형식의 날짜 또는 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6539">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6540">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6540">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6541">`Regex_italy_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6541">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6542">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6542">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6566">이탈리아 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6566">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6567">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6567">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6568">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6568">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6569">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6569">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6570">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6570">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6571">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6571">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6572">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6572">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6573">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6573">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6574">선택적 소수점 문자가 있는 13자 영문자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6574">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6575">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6575">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6576">선택적 delimiters가 있는 13자 영문자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6576">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6577">I 또는 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6577">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6578">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6578">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6579">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 콤보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6579">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6580">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6580">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6581">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6582">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6582">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6583">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6584">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6584">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6585">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6585">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6586">검색된 Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6586">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6587">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6587">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6588">이 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6588">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6589">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6589">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6590">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6590">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6591">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6591">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6592">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6592">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6593">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6593">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6594">iva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6594">iva</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6596">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6596">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6597">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6597">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6598">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6598">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6599">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6599">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6600">bank account number:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6600">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6601">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6601">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6602">bank account branch code:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6602">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6603">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6603">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6604">공백 또는 대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6604">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6605">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6605">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6606">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6606">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6607">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6607">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6608">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6608">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6609">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6609">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6610">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6610">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6611">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6611">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6612">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6612">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6613">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6613">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6614">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6614">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6615">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6615">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6616">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6616">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6617">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6617">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6618">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6618">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_bank_account"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6619">Keyword_jp_bank_account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6619">Keyword_jp_bank_account</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6620">Checking Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6620">Checking Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6621">Checking Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6621">Checking Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6622">Checking Account #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6622">Checking Account #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6623">Checking Acct Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6623">Checking Acct Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6624">Checking Acct #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6624">Checking Acct #</span></span>

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6664">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6664">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6665">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6665">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6666">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6666">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6667">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6667">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6668">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6668">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6669">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6669">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6670">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6670">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6671">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6671">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6672">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6672">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6673">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6673">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6674">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6674">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6712">일본 내 번호 - 회사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6712">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6713">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6713">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6714">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6714">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6715">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6715">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6716">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6716">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6717">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6717">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6718">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6718">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6719">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6719">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6720">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6720">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6721">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6721">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6722">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6722">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6723">1자리에서 9자리까지의 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6723">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6724">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6724">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6725">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6726">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6726">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6727">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6728">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6728">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6729">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6729">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6730">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6730">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6731">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6731">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6732">이 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6732">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6733">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6733">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6734">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6734">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6735">회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6735">corporate number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6736">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6736">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6737">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6737">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6738">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6738">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6739">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6739">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6740">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6740">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6741">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6741">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6742">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6742">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6743">法人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6743">法人番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6745">일본 내 번호 - 개인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6745">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6746">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6746">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6747">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6747">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6748">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6748">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6749">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6749">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6750">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6750">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6751">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6751">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6752">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6752">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6753">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6753">12-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6754">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6754">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6755">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6755">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6756">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6756">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6757">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6757">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6758">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6758">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6759">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6759">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6760">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6760">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6761">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6762">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6762">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6763">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6764">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6764">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6765">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6765">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6766">검색된 Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6766">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6767">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6767">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6768">이 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6768">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6769">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6769">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6770">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6770">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6771">my number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6771">my number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6772">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6772">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6773">個人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6773">個人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6774">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6774">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6775">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6775">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6776">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6776">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6777">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6777">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6778">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6778">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6779">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6779">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6780">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6780">通知カード</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6781">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6781">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6782">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6782">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6783">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6783">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6784">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6784">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6785">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6785">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6786">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6786">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6787">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6787">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6788">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6788">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6789">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6789">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6790">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6790">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6791">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6791">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6792">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6792">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6793">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6793">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6794">Passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6794">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6795">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6795">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6796">Passport No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6796">Passport No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6797">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6797">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6798">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6798">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6799">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6799">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6800">パスポートナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6800">パスポートナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6801">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6801">パスポート＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6802">パスポート #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6802">パスポート#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6803">ストトトNo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6803">パスポートNo.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6804">旅券番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6804">旅券番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6805">旅券番号＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6805">旅券番号＃</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6806">旅券番号♯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6806">旅券番号♯</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6807">旅券ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6807">旅券ナンバー</span></span>


## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6808">일본 거주 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6808">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6809">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6809">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6810">문자 및 숫자 12개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6810">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6811">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6811">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6812">12개 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6812">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6813">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6813">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6814">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6814">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6815">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6815">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6816">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6816">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6817">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6817">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6818">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6818">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6819">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6819">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6820">정규식 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6820">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6821">검색된 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6821">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6822">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6822">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6823">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6823">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6824">거주 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6824">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6825">거주 카드 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6825">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6826">거주 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6826">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6827">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6827">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6828">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6828">在留カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6829">在留番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6829">在留番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6830">일본 거주 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6830">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6831">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6831">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6832">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6832">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6833">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6834">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6834">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6835">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6835">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6836">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6836">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6837">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6837">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6838">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6838">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6839">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6839">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6840">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6840">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6845">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6845">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6846">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6846">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6847">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6847">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6850">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6850">証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6851">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6851">登録番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6853">일본 SIN(사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6853">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6854">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6854">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6855">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6855">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6856">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6856">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6857">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6857">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6858">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6858">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6859">하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6859">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6860">6자리 숫자 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6860">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6861">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6861">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6862">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6862">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6863">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6863">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6864">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6864">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6865">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6865">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6866">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6866">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6867">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6867">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6868">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6868">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6869">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6869">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6870">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6870">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6886">介護保険被保険者番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6886">介護保険被保険者番号</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6891">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6891">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6892">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6892">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6893">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6893">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6894">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6894">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6895">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6895">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6896">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6896">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6897">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6897">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6898">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6898">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6899">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6899">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6900">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6900">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6901">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6901">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6902">`Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6902">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-6903">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-6903">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7028">라트비아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7028">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7029">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7029">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7030">11자리 숫자 및 하이픈(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7030">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7031">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7031">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7032">이전 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7032">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7033">11자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7033">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7034">생년월일(DDMMYY)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7034">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7035">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7035">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7036">생년월일(19번째 19번째 10년의 경우 "1", 21세기의 경우 "2")에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7036">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7037">4자리 숫자( 임의로 생성)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7037">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7038">새 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7038">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7039">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7039">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7040">두 자리 숫자 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7040">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7041">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7041">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7042">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7042">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7043">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7043">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7044">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7044">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7045">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7045">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7046">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7046">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7047">시작  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7047">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7048">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7048">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7049">함수 또는  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` regex가 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7049">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7050">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7050">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7051">Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7051">Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7052">관리 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7052">administrative number</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7112">라트비아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7112">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7113">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7114">공백이나 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자와 문자 2자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7114">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7115">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7115">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7116">2개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7116">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7117">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7117">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7118">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7118">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7119">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7120">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7120">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7121">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7122">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7122">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7123">`Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7123">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7124">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7124">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7125">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7125">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7126">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7126">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7127">`Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7127">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7128">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7128">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7151">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7151">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7152">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7152">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7153">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7153">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7154">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7154">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7155">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7155">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7156">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7157">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7157">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7158">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7159">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7159">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7160">`Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7160">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7161">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7161">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7291">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7291">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7292">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7292">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7293">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7293">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7294">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7294">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7295">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7295">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7296">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7296">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7297">생년월일과 성별 및 세기에 해당하는 1자리 숫자(1-6)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7297">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7298">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7298">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7299">생년월일 일련 번호에 해당하는 세 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7299">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7300">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7300">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7301">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7301">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7302">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7302">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7303">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7303">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7304">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7304">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7305">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7305">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7306">시작  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7306">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7307">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7307">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7308">이  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7308">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7343">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7343">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7344">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7344">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7345">공백이나 공백이 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7345">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7346">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7346">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7347">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7347">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7348">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7348">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7349">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7349">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7350">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7350">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7351">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7351">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7352">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7352">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7353">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7353">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7354">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7354">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7355">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7355">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7356">`Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7356">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7357">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7357">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7370">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7370">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7371">paso numeris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7371">paso numeris</span></span>
