- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7375">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7375">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7376">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7376">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7377">룩세르버그 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7377">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7378">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7379">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7379">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7380">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7381">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7381">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7382">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7382">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7383">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7383">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7384">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7384">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7385">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7385">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7386">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7386">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7387">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7387">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7511">룩룩부르크 국가 ID 번호(자연인)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7511">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7512">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7512">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7513">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7513">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7514">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7514">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7515">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7515">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7516">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7516">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7517">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7517">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7518">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7519">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7519">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7520">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7521">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7521">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7522">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7522">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7523">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7523">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7524">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7524">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7525">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7525">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7526">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7526">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7527">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7527">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7528">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7528">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7529">시작  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7529">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7530">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7530">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7531">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7531">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7532">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7532">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7537">유휴 직원</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7537">id personnelle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7538">idpersonnelle #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7538">idpersonnelle#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7542">개별 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7542">individual identification</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7546">personal identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7546">personal identification</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7554">룩세르버그 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7554">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7555">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7555">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7556">공백이나 공백이 없는 8자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7556">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7557">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7557">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7558">8자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7558">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7559">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7559">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7560">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7560">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7561">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7561">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7562">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7562">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7563">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7563">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7564">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7564">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7565">정규식이 DD MM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7565">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7566">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7566">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7567">`Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7567">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7568">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7568">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7569">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7569">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7581">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7581">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7599">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7599">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7600">룩룩부르크 국가 ID 번호(자연인이 아닌 사람)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7600">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7601">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7601">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7602">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7602">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7603">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7603">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7604">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7604">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7605">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7605">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7606">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7606">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7607">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7607">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7608">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7608">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7609">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7609">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7610">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7610">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7611">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7611">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7612">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7612">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7613">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7613">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7614">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7614">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7615">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7615">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7616">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7616">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7617">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7617">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7618">시작  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7618">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7619">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7619">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7620">이  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7620">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7660">말레이시아 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7660">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7661">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7662">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7662">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7663">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7664">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7664">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7665">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7665">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7666">대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7666">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7667">2문자 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7667">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7668">대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7668">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7669">3개의 임의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7669">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7670">1자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7670">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7671">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7672">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7672">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7673">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7674">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7674">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7675">정규식 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7675">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7676">검색된 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7676">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7679">디지털 응용 프로그램 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7679">digital application card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7694">mykad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7694">mykad</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7695">mykas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7695">mykas</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7698">mytentera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7698">mytentera</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7700">malaysian identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7700">malaysian identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7701">nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7701">nric</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7702">개인 식별 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7702">personal identification card</span></span>

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7703">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7703">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7704">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7705">지정된 패턴의 2자 및 6자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7705">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7706">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7706">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7707">2개의 문자와 6자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7707">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7708">2자(숫자 또는 문자, 대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7708">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7709">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7709">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7710">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7710">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7711">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7711">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7712">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7712">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7713">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7714">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7714">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7715">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7716">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7716">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7717">`Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7717">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7718">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7718">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7842">몰타 ID 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7842">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7843">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7843">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7844">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7844">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7845">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7845">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7846">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7846">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7847">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7847">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7848">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7848">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7849">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7849">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7850">7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7850">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7851">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7851">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7852">7자리 숫자와 한 글자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7852">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7853">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7853">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7854">"M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z"(대소문자 미정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7854">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7855">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7855">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7856">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7856">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7857">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7857">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7858">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7858">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7859">`Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7859">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7860">시작  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7860">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7861">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7861">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7862">`Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7862">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7863">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7863">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7864">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7864">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7865">citizen service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7865">citizen service number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7866">id tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7866">id tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7867">identifika numru tal-biljett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7867">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7868">kodiċi 개인 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7868">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7869">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7869">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7870">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7870">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7871">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7871">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7872">numru ta' identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7872">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7873">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7873">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7874">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7874">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7875">개인 숫자 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7875">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7876">고유 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7876">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7877">고유 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7877">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7878">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7878">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>


## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7879">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7879">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7880">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7881">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7881">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7882">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7883">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7883">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7884">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7884">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7885">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7885">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7886">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7886">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7887">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7887">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7888">`Regex_malta_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7888">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7889">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7889">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7890">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7890">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7891">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7891">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7892">`Regex_malta_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7892">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7893">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7893">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7894">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7894">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7895">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7895">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7896">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7896">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7897">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7897">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7898">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7898">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7899">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7899">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7900">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7900">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7901">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7901">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7902">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7902">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7903">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7903">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7904">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7904">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7905">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7905">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7906">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7906">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7907">numru tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7907">numru tal-passaport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7908">numri tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7908">numri tal-passaport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7909">Nru tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7909">Nru tal-passaport</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7910">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7910">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7911">문제의 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7911">date of issue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7912">만료 날짜</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7912">date of expiry</span></span>


## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7913">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7913">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7914">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7915">몰타어 국가:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7915">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7916">지정된 패턴의 7자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7916">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7917">몰타어가 아닌 국가 및 몰타 엔터티:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7917">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7918">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7918">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7919">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7919">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7920">몰타 국가: 7자리 숫자 및 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7920">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7921">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7921">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7922">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7922">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7923">몰타어가 아닌 국가 및 몰타 엔터티: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7923">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7924">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7924">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7925">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7925">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7926">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7926">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7927">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7927">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7928">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7928">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7929">regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  또는 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7929">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7930">시작  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7930">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7931">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7931">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7932">regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 또는 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7932">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="medicare-beneficiary-identifier-mbi-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7965">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier(MBI) 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7965">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7966">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7966">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7967">영문자 11자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7967">eleven character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7968">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7968">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7969">1에서 9 사이의 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7969">one digit between 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7970">S, L, O, I, B, Z를 제외한 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7970">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7971">S, L, O, I, B, Z를 제외한 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7971">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7972">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7972">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7973">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7973">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7974">S, L, O, I, B, Z를 제외한 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7974">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7975">S, L, O, I, B, Z를 제외한 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7975">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7976">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7976">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7977">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7977">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7978">S, L, O, I, B, Z를 제외한 두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7978">two letters excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7979">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7979">two digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7980">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7981">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7981">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7982">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7983">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7983">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7984">`Regex_mbi_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7984">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7985">시작  `Keyword_mbi_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7985">A keyword from  `Keyword_mbi_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7986">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7986">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7987">`Regex_mbi_card`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7987">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card -->
      <Entity id="f753a286-f5cc-47e6-a592-4be25fd02591" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7988">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7988">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_mbi_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7989">Keyword_mbi_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7989">Keyword_mbi_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7990">mbi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7990">mbi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7991">mbi #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7991">mbi#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7992">medicare beneficiary #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7992">medicare beneficiary #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7993">medicare 수급자 식별자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7993">medicare beneficiary identifier</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7994">medicare beneficiary no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7994">medicare beneficiary no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7995">medicare beneficiary number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7995">medicare beneficiary number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7996">medicare beneficiary #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7996">medicare beneficiary#</span></span>


## <a name="mexico-unique-population-registry-code-curp"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7997">멕시코 고유의 인구 레지스트리 코드(CURP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7997">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7998">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7998">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-7999">영문자 18자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-7999">18 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8000">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8000">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8001">4개의 문자(대소문자 미지정)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8001">four letters (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8002">유효한 날짜를 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8002">six digits indicating a valid date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8003">문자 - H/h 또는 M/m</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8003">a letter - H/h or M/m</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8004">유효한 멕시코 상태 코드를 나타내는 두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8004">two letters indicating a valid Mexican state code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8005">3개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8005">three letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8006">한 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8006">one letter or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8007">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8007">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8008">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8008">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8009">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8009">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8010">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8011">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8011">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8012">이  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8012">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8013">시작  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8013">A keyword from  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8014">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8014">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8015">이  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8015">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP) -->
      <Entity id="e905ad4d-5a74-406d-bf36-b1efca798af4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8016">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8016">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_mexico_population_registry_code"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8017">Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8017">Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8018">Clave Única de Registro de Población</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8018">Clave Única de Registro de Población</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8019">Clave Unica de Registro de Poblacion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8019">Clave Unica de Registro de Poblacion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8020">고유 인구 레지스트리 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8020">Unique Population Registry Code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8021">고유 인구 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8021">unique population code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8022">CURP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8022">CURP</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8036">네덜란드 시민 서비스(BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8036">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8037">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8037">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8038">선택적 공백을 포함하는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8038">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8039">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8039">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8040">8-9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8040">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8041">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8041">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8042">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8042">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8043">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8043">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8044">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8044">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8045">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8045">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8046">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8046">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8047">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8047">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8048">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8048">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8049">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8049">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8050">이 Func_netherlands_bsn 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8050">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8051">검색된 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8051">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8052">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8052">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8076">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8076">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8077">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8078">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8078">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8079">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8080">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8080">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8081">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8081">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8082">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8082">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8083">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8083">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8084">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8084">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8085">`Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8085">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8086">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8086">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8214">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8214">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8215">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8215">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8216">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 9개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8216">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8217">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8217">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8218">9개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8218">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8219">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8219">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8220">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8220">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8221">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8221">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8222">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8222">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8223">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8223">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8224">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8224">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8225">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date`정규식은 DD MMM/MMM YYYY 형식의 날짜를 검색합니다(예제 - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8225">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8226">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8226">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8227">`Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8227">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8228">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8228">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8246">네덜란드 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8246">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8247">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8247">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8248">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8248">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8249">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8249">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8250">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8250">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8251">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8251">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8252">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8252">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8253">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8253">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8254">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8254">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8255">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8255">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8256">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8256">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8257">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8257">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8258">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8258">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8259">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8259">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8260">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8260">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8261">이  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8261">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8262">시작  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8262">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8263">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8263">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8264">이  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8264">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8302">네덜란드 부가가치세 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8302">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8303">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8303">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8304">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8304">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8305">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8305">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8306">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8306">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8307">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8307">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8308">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8308">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8309">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8309">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8310">영문자 14자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8310">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8311">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8311">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8312">14자 영문 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8312">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8313">N 또는 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8313">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8314">L 또는 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8314">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8315">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8315">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8316">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8316">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8317">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8317">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8318">B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8318">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8319">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8319">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8320">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8320">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8321">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8321">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8322">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8322">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8323">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8323">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8324">이 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8324">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8325">검색된 Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8325">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8326">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8326">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8327">이 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8327">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8328">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8328">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8330">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8330">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8331">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8331">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8332">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8332">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8333">wearde tafoege tax getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8333">wearde tafoege tax getal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8334">btw nûmer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8334">btw nûmer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8335">btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8335">btw-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8336">뉴질랜드 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8336">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8337">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8337">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8338">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8338">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8339">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8339">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8340">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8340">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8341">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8341">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8342">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8342">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8343">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8343">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8344">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 14자리에서 16자리 패턴으로</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8344">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8345">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8345">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8346">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 14자리에서 16자리 패턴으로:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8346">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8347">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8347">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8348">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8348">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8349">3-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8349">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8350">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8350">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8351">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8351">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8352">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8352">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8353">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8353">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8354">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8354">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8355">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8355">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8356">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8356">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8357">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8357">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8358">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8358">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8359">이 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8359">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8360">검색된 Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8360">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8361">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8361">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8362">이 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8362">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
