## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8370">뉴질랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8370">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8371">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8371">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8372">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8372">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8373">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8373">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8374">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8374">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8375">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8375">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8376">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8376">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8377">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8377">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8378">영문자 8자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8378">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8379">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8379">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8380">영문자 8자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8380">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8381">두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8381">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8382">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8382">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8383">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8383">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8384">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8384">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8385">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8385">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8386">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8386">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8387">이 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8387">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8388">검색된 Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8388">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8389">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8389">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8390">이 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8390">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8463">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8463">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8464">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8464">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8465">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8465">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8466">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8466">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8467">선택적 디지타이터가 있는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8467">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8468">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8468">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8469">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8469">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8470">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8470">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8471">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8471">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8472">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8472">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8473">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8473">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8474">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8474">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8475">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8475">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8476">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8476">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8477">이 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8477">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8478">검색된 Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8478">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8479">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8479">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8480">이 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8480">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8481">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8481">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8482">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8482">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8483">ird 아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8483">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8484">ird no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8484">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8485">nz ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8485">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8486">뉴질랜드 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8486">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8487">ird 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8487">ird number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8488">내륙 수익 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8488">inland revenue number</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8489">뉴질랜드 보건부 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8489">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8490">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8490">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8491">3개의 문자, 공백(선택 사항) 및 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8491">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8492">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8492">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8493">'I' 및 'O'를 제외한 3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8493">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8494">공백(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8494">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8495">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8495">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8496">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8496">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8497">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8497">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8498">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8498">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8499">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8499">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8500">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8500">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8501">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8501">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8502">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8502">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8503">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8503">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8504">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8504">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8505">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8505">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8506">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8506">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8507">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8507">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8508">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8508">NHI</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8510">상태</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8510">Health</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8511">처리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8511">treatment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8512">국가 건강 인덱스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8512">National Health Index Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8513">nhi number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8513">nhi number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8514">nhi no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8514">nhi no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8515">NHI #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8515">NHI#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8516">National Health Index No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8516">National Health Index No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8517">National Health Index Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8517">National Health Index Id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8518">국가 건강 인덱스 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8518">National Health Index #</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8519">뉴질랜드 사회 일지 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8519">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8520">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8520">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8521">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8521">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8522">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8522">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8523">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8523">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8524">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8524">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8525">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8525">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8526">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8526">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8527">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8527">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8528">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8528">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8529">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8529">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8530">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8530">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8531">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8531">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8532">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8532">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8533">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8533">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8534">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8534">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8535">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8535">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8536">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8536">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8537">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8537">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8538">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8538">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8539">이 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8539">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8540">검색된 Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8540">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8541">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8541">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8542">이 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8542">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8543">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8543">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8544">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8544">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8547">social social social no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8547">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8548">social social social number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8548">social welfare number</span></span>

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8550">노르웨이 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8550">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8551">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8551">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8552">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8552">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8553">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8553">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8554">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8554">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8555">생년월일인 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8555">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8556">3자리 개별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8556">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8557">검사 숫자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8557">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8558">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8558">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8559">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8559">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8560">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8560">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8561">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8561">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8562">이 Func_norway_id_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8562">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8563">검색된 Keyword_norway_id_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8563">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8564">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8564">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8565">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8565">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8566">이 Func_norway_id_numbe 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8566">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8567">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8567">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8572">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8572">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8573">Identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8573">Identification</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8576">필리핀 통합 다목적 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8576">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8577">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8577">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8578">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8578">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8579">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8579">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8580">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8580">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8581">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8581">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8582">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8582">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8583">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8583">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8584">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8584">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8585">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8585">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8586">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8586">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8587">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8587">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8588">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8588">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8589">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8589">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8590">정규식 Regex_philippines_unified_id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8590">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8591">검색된 Keyword_philippines_id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8591">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8592">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8592">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8593">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8593">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8594">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8594">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8595">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8595">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8596">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8596">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8597">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8597">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8598">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8598">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8599">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8599">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8600">슬래시 2개가 포함된 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8600">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8601">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8601">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8602">14자리 숫자와 슬래시 2개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8602">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8603">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8603">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8604">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8604">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8605">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8605">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8606">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8606">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8607">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8607">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8608">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8608">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8609">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8609">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8610">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8610">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8611">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8611">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8612">`Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8612">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8613">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8613">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8737">폴란드 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8737">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8738">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8739">3개의 문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8739">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8740">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8741">3개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8741">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8742">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8742">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8743">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8743">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8744">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8744">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8745">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8745">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8746">Func_polish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8746">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8747">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8747">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8748">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8748">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8749">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8749">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8759">폴란드 국가 ID(PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8759">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8760">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8760">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8761">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8761">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8762">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8762">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8763">YYMMDD 형식의 생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8763">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8764">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8764">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8765">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8765">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8766">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8767">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8767">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8768">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8769">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8769">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8770">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8770">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8771">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8771">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8772">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8772">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8773">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8773">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8774">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8774">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8775">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8775">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8776">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8776">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8778">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8778">dowód osobisty</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8780">niepowtarzalny numer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8780">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8781">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8781">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8782">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8782">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8783">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8783">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8784">numer identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8784">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8785">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8785">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8786">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8786">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8787">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8787">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8788">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8788">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8789">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8789">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8790">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8790">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8791">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8791">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8792">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8792">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8793">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8793">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8794">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8794">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8795">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8795">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8796">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8796">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8797">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8797">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8798">이 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8798">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8799">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8799">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8800">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8800">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8801">시작 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8801">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8802">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8802">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8803">이 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8803">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8804">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8804">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8805">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8805">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8806">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8806">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8807">이 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8807">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8808">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8808">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8834">폴란드 REGON 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8834">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8835">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8835">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8836">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8836">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8837">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8837">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8838">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8838">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8839">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8839">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8840">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8840">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8841">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8842">9자리 또는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8842">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8843">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8844">9자리 또는 14자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8844">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8845">9자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8845">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8846">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8846">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8847">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8847">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8848">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8848">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8849">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8849">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8850">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8850">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8851">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8851">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8852">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8852">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8853">이 Func_polish_regon_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8853">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8854">검색된 Keywords_polish_regon_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8854">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8855">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8855">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8856">이 Func_polish_regon_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8856">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_poland_regon_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8858">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8858">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8860">통계 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8860">statistical number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8861">statistical id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8861">statistical id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8862">statistical no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8862">statistical no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8863">regon number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8863">regon number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8864">regonid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8864">regonid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8865">regonno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8865">regonno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8866">company id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8866">company id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8867">companyid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8867">companyid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8868">companyidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8868">companyidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8869">numer statystyczny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8869">numer statystyczny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8870">numeru regon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8870">numeru regon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8871">numerstatystyczny #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8871">numerstatystyczny#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8872">numeruregon #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8872">numeruregon#</span></span>


## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8873">폴란드 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8873">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8874">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8874">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8875">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8875">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8876">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8876">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8877">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8877">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8878">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8878">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8879">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8879">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8880">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8881">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8881">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8882">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8883">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8883">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8884">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8884">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8885">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8885">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8886">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8886">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8887">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8887">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8888">이  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8888">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8889">시작  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8889">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8919">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8919">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8920">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8920">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8921">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8921">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8922">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8922">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8923">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8923">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8924">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8924">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8925">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8925">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8926">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8926">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8927">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8927">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8928">정규식 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8928">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8929">검색된 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8929">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8949">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8949">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8950">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8950">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8951">두 개의 패턴 - 문자 2개와 특수 문자가 있는 5-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8951">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8952">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8952">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8953">패턴 1: 문자 2개와 특수 문자가 있는 5/6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8953">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8954">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8954">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8955">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8955">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8956">5 또는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8956">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8957">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8957">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8958">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8958">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8959">패턴 2: 문자 1개와 특수 문자가 있는 6/8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8959">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8960">1개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8960">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8961">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8961">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8962">6 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8962">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8963">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8963">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8964">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8964">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8965">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8965">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8966">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8966">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8967">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8967">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8968">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8968">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8969">`Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8969">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8970">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8970">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8971">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8971">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8979">driver lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8979">driver lic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8980">driver lics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8980">driver lics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8981">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8981">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8982">driver licenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8982">driver licenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-8983">driver licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-8983">driver licence</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9102">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9102">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9103">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9103">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9104">공백이나 따로 6자리 숫자를 입력하고 공백이나 따로 문자를 1개씩 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9104">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9105">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9105">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9106">한 문자와 6자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9106">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9107">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9107">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9108">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9108">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9109">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9109">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9110">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9110">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9111">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9111">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9112">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9112">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9113">`Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9113">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9114">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9114">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9115">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9115">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9116">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9116">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9117">`Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9117">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9118">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9118">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9145">포르투갈 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9145">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9146">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9146">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9147">선택적 공백이 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9147">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9148">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9148">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9149">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9149">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9150">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9150">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9151">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9151">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9152">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9152">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9153">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9153">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9154">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9154">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9155">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9155">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9156">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9156">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9157">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9157">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9158">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9158">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9159">시작  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9159">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9160">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9160">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9161">이  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9161">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9170">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9170">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9171">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9171">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9172">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9172">tax identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9175">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9175">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9176">tax registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9176">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9177">에 대한 나타 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9177">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9178">일자 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9178">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9179">일자 수 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9179">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9180">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9180">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9181">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9181">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9182">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9182">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9183">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9183">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9184">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9184">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9185">tin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9185">tin#</span></span>


## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9186">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9186">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9187">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9187">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9188">문자 1개와 숫자 8자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9188">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9189">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9189">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9190">한 문자와 8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9190">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9191">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9191">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9192">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9192">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9193">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9193">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9194">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9194">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9195">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9195">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9196">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9196">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9197">`Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9197">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9198">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9198">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9199">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9199">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9200">Keywords_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9200">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9201">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9201">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9202">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9202">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9203">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9203">driverlicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9204">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9204">driverlicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9205">driverlicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9205">driverlicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9206">driverlicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9206">driverlicences</span></span>

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9326">루마니아 CNP(개인 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9326">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9327">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9327">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9328">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9328">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9329">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9329">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9330">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9330">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9331">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9331">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9332">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9332">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9333">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9333">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9334">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9334">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9335">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9335">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9336">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9336">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9337">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자(YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9337">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9338">01-52 또는 99일 수 있는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9338">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9339">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9339">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9340">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9340">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9341">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9341">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9342">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9342">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9343">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9343">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9344">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9344">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9345">시작  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9345">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9346">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9346">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9347">이  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9347">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
