## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9398">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9398">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9399">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9399">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9400">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 8 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9400">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9401">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9401">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9402">8자리 또는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9402">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9403">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9403">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9404">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9404">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9405">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9405">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9406">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9406">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9407">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9407">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9408">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9408">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9409">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_date`정규식은 DD MMM/MMM YY(예제- 01 FEB/FEB 10) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9409">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9410">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9410">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9411">`Regex_romania_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9411">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9412">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9412">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9430">러시아 여권 번호 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9430">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9431">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9431">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9432">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9432">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9433">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9433">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9434">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9434">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9435">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9435">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9436">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9436">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9437">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9438">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9438">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9439">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9440">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9440">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9441">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9441">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9442">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9442">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9443">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9443">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9444">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9444">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9445">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9445">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9446">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9446">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9447">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9447">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9448">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9448">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9449">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9449">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9450">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9450">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9451">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9451">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9452">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9452">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9454">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9454">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9455">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9455">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9456">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9456">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9457">passport id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9457">passport id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9458">passportno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9458">passportno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9459">passportnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9459">passportnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9460">паспорт нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9460">паспорт нет</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9461">паспорт id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9461">паспорт id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9462">pоссийской паспорт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9462">pоссийской паспорт</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9463">pусский номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9463">pусский номер паспорта</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9465">паспортid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9465">паспортid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9466">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9466">номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9467">номерпаспорта #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9467">номерпаспорта#</span></span>


## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9468">러시아 여권 번호 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9468">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9469">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9469">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9470">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9470">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9471">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9471">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9472">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9472">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9473">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9473">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9474">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9474">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9475">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9476">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9476">nine-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9477">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9478">9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9478">nine-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9479">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9479">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9480">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9480">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9481">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9481">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9482">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9482">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9483">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9483">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9484">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9484">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9485">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9485">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9486">regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9486">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9487">검색된 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9487">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9497">паспорт id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9497">паспорт id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9499">pусский номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9499">pусский номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9500">паспорт #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9500">паспорт#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9502">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9502">номер паспорта</span></span>

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9504">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9504">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9505">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9505">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9506">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9506">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9507">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9507">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9508">10자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9508">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9509">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9509">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9510">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9510">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9511">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9511">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9512">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9512">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9513">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9513">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9514">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9514">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9515">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9515">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9516">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9516">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9517">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9517">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9518">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9518">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9519">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9519">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9520">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9520">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9521">싱가포르 NRIC(국가 등록 ID 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9521">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9522">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9522">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9523">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9523">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9524">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9524">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9525">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9525">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9526">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T"(대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9526">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9527">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9527">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9528">사전순 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9528">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9529">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9530">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9530">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9531">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9532">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9532">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9533">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9533">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9534">검색된 Keyword_singapore_nric 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9534">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9535">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9535">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9536">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9536">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9537">정규식은 Regex_singapore_nric 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9537">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9538">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9538">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9539">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9539">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_singapore_nric"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9540">Keyword_singapore_nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9540">Keyword_singapore_nric</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9541">National Registration Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9541">National Registration Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9542">Identity Card Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9542">Identity Card Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9543">NRIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9543">NRIC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9544">IC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9544">IC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9545">Foreign Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9545">Foreign Identification Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9546">FIN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9546">FIN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9547">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9547">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9548">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9548">身份證</span></span> 

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9549">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9549">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9550">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9550">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9551">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9551">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9552">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9552">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9553">한 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9553">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9554">한 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9554">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9555">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9555">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9556">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9557">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9557">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9558">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9559">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9559">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9560">`Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9560">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9561">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9561">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9687">슬로바키아 개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9687">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9688">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9688">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9689">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9689">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9690">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9690">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9691">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9691">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9692">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9692">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9693">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9693">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9694">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9695">선택적 백 슬래시를 포함하는 9자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9695">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9696">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9696">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9697">생년월일을 나타내는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9697">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9698">선택적 슬래시(/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9698">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9699">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9699">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9700">선택적 검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9700">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9701">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9702">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9702">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9703">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9704">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9704">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9705">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9705">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9706">시작  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9706">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9707">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9707">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9708">이  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9708">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9755">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9755">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9756">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9757">공백이나 공백이 없는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9757">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9758">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9759">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9759">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9760">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9760">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9761">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9761">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9762">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9762">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9763">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9763">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9764">`Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9764">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9765">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9765">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9766">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9766">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9767">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9767">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9768">`Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9768">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9769">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9769">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9791">스로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9791">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9792">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9793">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9793">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9794">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9794">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9795">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9795">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9796">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9796">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9797">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9797">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9798">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9798">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9799">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9799">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9800">`Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9800">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9801">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9801">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9928">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9928">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9929">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9929">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9930">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9930">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9931">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9931">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9932">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9932">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9933">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9933">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9934">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9934">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9935">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9936">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9936">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9937">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9938">지정된 패턴의 13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9938">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9939">"LLL"이 생년월일의 마지막 3자리에 해당하는 생년월일(DDMMLLL)에 해당하는 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9939">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9940">생년월일 "50"에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9940">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9941">같은 날에 출생한 사람의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당하는 3자리 숫자(남성 000-499, 여성의 경우 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9941">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9942">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9942">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9943">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9943">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9944">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9944">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9945">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9945">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9946">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9946">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9947">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9947">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9948">시작  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9948">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9949">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9949">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9950">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9950">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9978">솔로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9978">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9979">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9979">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9980">공백이나 따로 7자리 숫자를 입력할 때 공백이나 공백이 없는 문자 2개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9980">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9981">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9981">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9982">2개의 문자와 7자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9982">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9983">문자 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9983">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9984">대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9984">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9985">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9985">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9986">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9987">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9987">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9988">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9989">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9989">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9990">`Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9990">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9991">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9991">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9992">`Regex_eu_passport_date1`정규식이 DD.MM.YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9992">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9993">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9994">`Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9994">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-9995">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-9995">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10018">솔로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10018">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10019">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10019">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10020">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10020">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10021">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10021">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10022">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10022">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10023">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10023">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10024">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10024">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10025">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10025">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10026">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10026">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10027">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10027">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10028">1-9에서 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10028">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10029">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10029">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10030">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10030">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10031">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10031">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10032">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10032">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10033">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10033">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10034">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10034">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10035">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10035">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10036">시작  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10036">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10037">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10037">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10038">이  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10038">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10040">Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10040">Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10043">številka davčne datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10043">številka davčne datoteke</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10046">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10046">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10047">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10047">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10048">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10048">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10049">tax no #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10049">tax no#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10051">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10051">tax number</span></span>

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10062">남아프리카 공화국 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10062">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10063">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10063">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10064">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10064">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10065">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10065">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10066">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10066">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10067">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10067">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10068">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10068">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10069">한 자리 숫자 시민권 표시기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10069">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10070">숫자 "8" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10070">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10071">체크 um 숫자인 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10071">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10072">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10072">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10073">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10073">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10074">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10074">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10075">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10075">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10076">이 Func_south_africa_identification_number 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10076">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10077">검색된 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10077">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10078">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10078">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10079">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10079">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10080">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10080">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10084">대한민국 거주자 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10084">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10085">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10085">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10086">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10086">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10087">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10087">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10088">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10088">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10089">생년월일인 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10089">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10090">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10090">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10091">세기 및 성별로 결정된 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10091">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10092">4자리 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10092">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10093">앞의 숫자가 동일한 사람들을 차별화하는 데 사용되는 한 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10093">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10094">검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10094">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10095">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10095">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10096">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10096">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10097">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10097">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10098">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10098">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10099">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10099">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10100">검색된 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10100">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10101">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10101">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10102">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10102">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10103">이 Func_south_korea_resident_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10103">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10104">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10104">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10105">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10105">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10106">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10106">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10107">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10107">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10108">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10108">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10109">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10109">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10110">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10110">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10111">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10111">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10112">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10112">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10113">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10114">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10114">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10115">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10115">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10116">8자리 숫자와 문자 1자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10116">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10117">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10117">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10118">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10118">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10119">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10119">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10120">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10120">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10121">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10121">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10122">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10122">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10123">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10123">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10124">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10124">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10125">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10125">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10126">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10126">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10260">스페인 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10260">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10261">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10261">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10262">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10262">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10263">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10263">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10264">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10264">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10265">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10265">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10266">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10266">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10267">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10267">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10268">8자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10268">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10269">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10269">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10270">7자리 숫자와 문자 1자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10270">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10271">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10271">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10272">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10272">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10273">검사 문자 1개(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10273">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10274">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10275">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10275">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10276">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10277">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10277">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10278">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10278">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10279">시작  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10279">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10280">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10280">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10281">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10281">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10301">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10301">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10302">개인 ID 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10302">personal identity no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10303">고유 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10303">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10304">uniqueid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10304">uniqueid#</span></span>

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10305">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10305">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10306">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10306">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10307">공백이나 디지타이터가 없는 문자와 숫자의 8자 또는 9자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10307">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10308">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10308">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10309">8자 또는 9자 조합의 문자와 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10309">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10310">2자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10310">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10311">1자리 숫자 또는 문자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10311">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10312">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10312">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10313">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10313">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10314">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10314">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10315">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10315">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10316">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10316">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10317">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10317">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10318">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10318">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10319">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD-MM-YYYY 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10319">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10320">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10320">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10321">`Regex_spain_eu_passport_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10321">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10322">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10322">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10323">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10323">Keywords</span></span>
