## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10351">스페인 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10351">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10352">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10352">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10353">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10353">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10354">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10354">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10355">11-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10355">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10356">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10356">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10357">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10357">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10358">7-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10358">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10359">슬래시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10359">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10360">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10360">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10361">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10362">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10362">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10363">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10364">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10364">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10365">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10365">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10366">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10366">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10367">시작  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10367">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10368">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10368">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10369">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10369">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10370">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10370">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10371">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10371">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10372">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10372">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10373">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10373">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10374">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10374">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10375">socialsecurityno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10375">socialsecurityno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10376">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10376">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10377">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10377">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10378">número de la seguridad social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10378">número de la seguridad social</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10379">스페인 세금 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10379">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10380">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10380">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10381">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10381">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10382">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10382">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10383">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10383">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10384">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10384">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10385">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10385">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10386">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10386">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10387">지정된 패턴에서 7-8자리 숫자와 1-2자리 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10387">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10388">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10388">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10389">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 있는 스페인어 자연인:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10389">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10390">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10390">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10391">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10391">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10392">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 비 거주자 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10392">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10393">대문자 1자 "L"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10393">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10394">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10394">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10395">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10395">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10396">스페인 국가 ID 카드가 없는 14세 미만의 거주자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10396">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10397">대문자 1자 "K"(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10397">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10398">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10398">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10399">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10399">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10400">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10400">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10401">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z"(대소문자 구분)의 대문자 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10401">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10402">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10402">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10403">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10403">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10404">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10404">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10405">"M"을(를) 구분하는 대문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10405">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10406">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10406">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10407">대문자 1개(대소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10407">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10408">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10408">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10409">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10409">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10410">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10410">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10411">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10411">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10412">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10412">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10413">시작  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10413">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10414">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10414">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10415">함수가  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾거나 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10415">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10446">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10446">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10447">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10448">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId" 다음에 아래 패턴에 설명된 문자와 문자열입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10448">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10449">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10449">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10450">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10450">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10451">1에서 200 사이의 대문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10451">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10452">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd"에서 "pwd"는 소문자 앞에 있지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10452">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10453">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10453">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10454">달러 기호($), 백분율 기호(%), 기호(>), 기호(@), 인용 부호("), 세미코론(;), 왼쪽 중괄호([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호({)가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10454">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10455">세미코론(;), 슬래시(/) 또는 인용 부호(")가 아닌 7-128자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10455">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10456">세미코론(;) 또는 인용 부호(")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10456">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10457">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10458">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10458">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10459">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10460">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10460">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10461">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10461">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10462">검색된 CEP_GlobalFilter 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10462">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10463">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10463">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10464">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10464">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10465">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10465">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10466">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10466">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10467">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10467">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10468">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10468">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10469">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10469">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10470">sample</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10470">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10471">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10471">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10472">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10472">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10473">암호 또는 pwd 다음에 0-2 공백, 등호(=), 0-2 공백 및 추가 표시(\*) -OR-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10473">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10474">암호 또는 pwd 다음을 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10474">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10475">등호(=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10475">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10476">기호(<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10476">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10477">대/소문자, 숫자, 추가 문자(\*), 하이픈(-), 밑 줄(_) 또는 공백 문자에 대한 1-200자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10477">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10478">기호보다 크다(>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10478">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10479">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10479">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10480">기술적으로 이 중요한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아닌 정규식을 사용하여 이러한 키워드를 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10480">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10481">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10481">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10482">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10482">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10483">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10483">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10484">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10484">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10485">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10485">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10486">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10486">localhost</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10492">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10492">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10493">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10493">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10494">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10494">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10495">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10495">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10496">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10496">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10497">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10497">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10498">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10498">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10499">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10499">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10500">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10500">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10501">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10501">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10502">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10502">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10503">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10503">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10504">`Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number`정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10504">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10505">키워드를  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10505">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10638">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10638">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10639">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10639">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10640">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10640">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10641">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10641">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10642">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10642">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10643">두 자리 숫자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10643">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10644">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10644">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10645">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10645">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10646">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10646">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10647">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10647">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10648">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10648">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10649">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10649">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10650">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10650">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10651">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10651">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10652">키워드를 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10652">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10653">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10653">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10654">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10654">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10655">이 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10655">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10656">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10656">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10675">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10675">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10676">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10676">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10677">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10677">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10678">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10678">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10679">8자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10679">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10680">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10681">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10681">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10682">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10683">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10683">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10684">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10684">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10685">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10685">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10686">`Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date`정규식이 DD MMM/MMM YY(01 JAN/JAN 12) 형식의 날짜를 찾거나 키워드가 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10686">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10687">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10687">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10688">정규식 Regex_sweden_passport_number 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10688">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10689">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10689">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10725">스웨덴 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10725">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10726">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10726">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10727">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10727">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10728">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10728">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10729">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10729">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10730">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10730">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10731">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10731">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10732">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10733">지정된 패턴의 10자리 숫자 및 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10733">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10734">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10735">10자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10735">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10736">생년월일(YYMMDD)에 해당하는 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10736">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10737">더하기 기호 또는 마이너스 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10737">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10738">ID 번호를 고유하게 만드는 세 자리 숫자입니다. 여기서:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10738">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10739">1990년 전에 발급된 숫자의 경우 7번째와 8번째 숫자는 생년월일 또는 외계인을 식별합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10739">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10740">9번째 위치의 숫자는 성별을 남성에 대해 홀수로 나타내거나 여성의 경우 조차도 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10740">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10741">검사 숫자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10741">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10742">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10742">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10743">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10743">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10744">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10744">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10745">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10745">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10746">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10746">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10747">시작  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10747">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10748">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10748">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10749">이  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10749">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10775">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10775">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10776">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10776">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10777">4개의 문자와 5-31개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10777">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10778">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10778">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10779">4개의 문자와 5-31개의 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10779">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10780">4문자 은행 코드(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10780">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10781">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10781">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10782">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10782">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10783">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10783">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10784">1~3자리 숫자(BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10784">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10785">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10785">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10786">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10786">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10787">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10787">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10788">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10788">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10789">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10789">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10790">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10790">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10819">BIC 조지민 님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10819">BICコード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10820">SWIFT ೺囏</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10820">SWIFT コード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10821">SWIFT 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10821">SWIFT 番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10822">BIC 番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10822">BIC 番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10823">BIC의 은(는)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10823">BIC コード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10824">金融機関識別コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10824">金融機関識別コード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10825">金融機関コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10825">金融機関コード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10826">銀行コード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10826">銀行コード</span></span>

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10827">스위스 SSN AHV 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10827">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10828">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10828">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10829">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10829">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10830">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10830">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10831">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10831">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10832">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10832">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10833">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10833">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10834">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10834">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10835">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10835">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10836">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10836">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10837">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10837">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10838">3자리 숫자 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10838">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10839">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10839">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10840">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10840">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10841">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10841">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10842">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10842">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10843">선택적 점</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10843">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10844">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10844">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10845">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10845">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10846">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10846">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10847">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10847">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10848">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10848">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10849">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10849">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10850">검색된 Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10850">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10851">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10851">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10852">이 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10852">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10861">개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10861">personal id number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10865">unique identification no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10865">unique identification no.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10870">sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10870">sozialversicherungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10871">identification personnelle id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10871">identification personnelle id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10872">numéro de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10872">numéro de sécurité sociale</span></span>

   
## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10873">대만 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10873">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10874">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10874">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10875">1개의 문자(영어) 및 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10875">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10876">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10876">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10877">한 문자(영어) 다음에 9자리 숫자를 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10877">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10878">한 글자(영어로, 대소문자를 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10878">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10879">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10879">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10880">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10880">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10881">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10881">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10882">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10882">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10883">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10883">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10884">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10884">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10885">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10885">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10886">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10886">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10887">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10887">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10888">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10888">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10889">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10889">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10890">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10890">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10891">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10891">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10892">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10892">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10893">身份證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10893">身份證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10894">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10894">身份證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10895">身份證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10895">身份證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10896">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10896">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10897">身分證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10897">身分證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10898">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10898">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10899">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10899">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10900">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10900">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10901">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10901">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10902">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10902">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10903">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10903">簽名</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10904">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10904">蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10905">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10905">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10906">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10906">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10907">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10907">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10908">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10908">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10909">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10909">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10910">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호: 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10910">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10911">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10911">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10912">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10912">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10913">문자 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10913">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10914">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10914">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10915">생체 인식이 아닌 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10915">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10916">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10916">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10917">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10918">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10918">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10919">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10920">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10920">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10921">정규식 Regex_taiwan_passport 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10921">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10922">검색된 Keyword_taiwan_passport 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10922">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10923">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10923">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10925">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10925">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10926">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10926">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10927">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10927">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10928">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10928">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10929">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10929">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10930">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10930">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10931">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10931">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10932">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10932">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10933">대만 거주 인증서(ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10933">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10934">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10934">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10935">10개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10935">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10936">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10936">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10937">10개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10937">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10938">2개 문자(대소문자 구분 안 )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10938">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10939">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10939">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10940">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10941">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10941">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10942">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10943">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10943">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10944">정규식은 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10944">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10945">검색된 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10945">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10946">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10946">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10947">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10947">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10948">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10948">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10949">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10949">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10950">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10950">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10951">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10951">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10952">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10952">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10953">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10953">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10954">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10954">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10955">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10955">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10956">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10956">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10957">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10957">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10958">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10958">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10959">태국어 인구 ID 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10959">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10960">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10960">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10961">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10961">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10962">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10962">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10963">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10963">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10964">첫 번째 숫자가 0 또는 9가 아닌 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10964">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10965">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10965">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10966">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10966">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10967">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10967">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10968">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10968">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10969">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10969">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10970">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10970">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10971">검색된 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10971">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10972">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10972">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10973">이 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10973">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10974">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10974">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10975">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10975">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10976">ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10976">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10977">Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10977">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10978">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10978">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10979">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10979">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10980">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10980">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10981">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10981">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10982">터키어 국가 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10982">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10983">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10984">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10984">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10985">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10986">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10986">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10987">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10987">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10988">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10988">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10989">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10989">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10990">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10990">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10991">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10991">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10992">검색된 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10992">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10993">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10994">이 Func_Turkish_National_Id 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10994">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10995">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10995">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10996">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10996">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10997">TC Kimlik No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10997">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10998">TC Kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10998">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-10999">Vatandaşlık numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-10999">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11000">Vatandaşlık no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11000">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11001">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11001">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11002">driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11002">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11003">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11003">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11004">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11004">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11005">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11005">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11006">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11006">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11007">5개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 문자 대신 숫자 "9")입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11007">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11008">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11008">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11009">생년월일의 날짜 형식 MMDDY의 5자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11009">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11010">드라이버가 여성인 경우 일곱 번째 문자가 50으로 증가합니다. 시험의 경우 01에서 12까지가 아니라 51에서 62까지입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11010">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11011">대소문자 2개(대소문자 구분 안 되거나 문자 대신 숫자 "9")를 입력합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11011">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11012">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11012">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11013">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11013">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11014">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11014">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11015">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11015">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11016">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11016">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11017">이 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11017">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11018">시작 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11018">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11019">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11019">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11020">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11020">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11021">이 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11021">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11022">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11022">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
