## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11143">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11143">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11144">선택 롤 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11144">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11145">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11145">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11146">2개의 문자와 1-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11146">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11147">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11147">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11148">2개의 문자(대소문자 구분 안 ), 1-4개 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11148">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11149">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11150">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11150">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11151">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11152">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11152">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11153">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11153">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11154">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11154">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11155">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11155">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11156">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11156">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11157">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11157">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11158">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11158">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11159">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11159">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11160">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11160">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11161">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11161">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11162">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11162">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11163">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11164">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11164">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11165">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11166">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11166">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11167">3자리 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11167">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11168">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11168">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11169">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11169">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11170">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11170">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11171">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11171">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11172">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11173">네.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11173">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11174">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11175">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11175">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11176">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11176">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11177">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11177">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11178">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11178">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11179">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11179">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11180">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11180">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11181">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11181">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11199">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11199">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11200">national insurance number (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11200">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11201">이 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요한 정보 유형에 포함됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11201">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11202">독립 실행형 중요한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11202">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11203">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11204">공백 또는 대시로 구분된 7자 또는 9자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11204">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11205">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11205">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11206">가능한 두 가지 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11206">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11207">두 문자(유효한 NINOS는 이 연결의 유효성을 검사하는 특정 문자만 사용하고 대소문자는 구분하지 않습니다.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11207">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11208">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11208">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11209">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D' 중 하나(접두사와 같이 접미사에는 특정 문자만 사용할 수 있습니다. 대소문자 구분 안 ).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11209">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11210">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11210">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11211">두 글자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11211">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11212">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11212">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11213">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11213">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11214">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11214">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11215">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11215">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11216">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11216">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11217">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11217">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11218">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11218">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11219">'A', 'B', 'C' 또는 'D'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11219">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11220">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11220">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11221">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11221">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11222">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11222">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11223">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11223">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11224">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11224">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11225">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11225">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11226">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11226">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11227">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11227">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11228">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11228">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11229">Keyword_uk_nino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11229">Keyword_uk_nino</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11230">national insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11230">national insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11231">national insurance contributions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11231">national insurance contributions</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11232">protection act</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11232">protection act</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11233">insurance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11233">insurance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11234">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11234">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11235">insurance application</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11235">insurance application</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11236">medical application</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11236">medical application</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11237">social insurance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11237">social insurance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11238">medical attention</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11238">medical attention</span></span>

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11249">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11249">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11250">고유 납세자 참조 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11250">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11251">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11251">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11252">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11252">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11253">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11253">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11254">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11254">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11255">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11255">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11256">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11256">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11257">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11257">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11258">공백 및 디지타이터가 없는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11258">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11259">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11259">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11260">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11260">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11261">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11262">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11262">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11263">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11264">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11264">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11265">이  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11265">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11266">시작  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 키워드가 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11266">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11286">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11286">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11287">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11287">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11288">6-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11288">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11289">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11289">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11290">6-17자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11290">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11291">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11292">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11292">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11293">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11294">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11294">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11295">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11295">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11296">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11296">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11326">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11326">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11327">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11328">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11328">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11329">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11330">주에 따라 다를 수 있습니다. 예: 뉴욕:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11330">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11331">ddd ddd ddd와 같은 9자리 숫자가 일치합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11331">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11332">dddddd와 같은 9자리 숫자는 일치하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11332">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11333">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11333">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11334">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11334">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11335">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11335">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11336">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11336">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11337">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11337">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11338">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11338">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11339">검색된 Keyword_us_drivers_license 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11339">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11340">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11340">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11341">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11341">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11342">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11342">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11343">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11343">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11344">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11344">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11442">미국 ITIN(개인 납세자 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11442">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11443">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11444">"9"로 시작하고 "7" 또는 "8"을 네 번째 숫자로 포함하는 9자리 숫자이며 선택적으로 공백 또는 대시로 서식이 지정됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11444">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11445">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11446">서식 있는 형식:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11446">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11447">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11447">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11448">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11448">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11449">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11449">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11450">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11450">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11451">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11451">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11452">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11452">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11453">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11453">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11454">unformatted:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11454">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11455">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11455">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11456">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11456">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11457">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11457">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11458">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11458">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11459">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11460">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11460">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11461">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11462">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11462">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11463">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11463">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11464">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11464">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11465">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11465">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11466">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11466">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11467">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11467">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11468">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11468">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11469">이 Func_formatted_itin Func_unformatted_itin 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11469">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11470">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11470">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11471">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11471">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11472">taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11472">taxpayer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11473">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11473">tax id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11474">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11474">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11475">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11475">itin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11476">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11476">i.t.i.n.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11477">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11477">ssn</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11478">tin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11478">tin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11479">social security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11479">social security</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11480">tax payer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11480">tax payer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11481">itins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11481">itins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11482">에 대한 나타</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11482">taxid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11483">individual taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11483">individual taxpayer</span></span> 


## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11484">미국 SSN(사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11484">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11485">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11486">서식이 지정되거나 서식 없는 패턴일 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11486">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11487">2011년 중반 전에 발급된 SSN의 서식은 강력합니다. 이 서식은 숫자의 특정 부분이 특정 범위 내에 있어야 합니다(체크 UM은 없음).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11487">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11488">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11488">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11489">네 가지 함수는 네 가지 다른 패턴에서 SSNS를 찾아보세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11489">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11490">Func_ssn 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정되어 있는 2011년보다 강력한 서식이 있는 SSNS를 검색합니다(ddd-dd-dd-dddd OR ddd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11490">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11491">Func_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자로 서식이 지정되지 않은 강력한 2011 강력한 서식의 SSNS를 검색합니다(dddddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11491">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11492">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 공백(ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd d)으로 서식이 지정된 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11492">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11493">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 9자리 연속 숫자로폼이 없는 2011년 후 SSNS를 검색합니다(dddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11493">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11494">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11494">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11495">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11495">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11496">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11496">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11497">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11497">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11498">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11498">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11499">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11499">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11500">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11500">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11501">이 Func_unformatted_ssn 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11501">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11502">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11502">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11503">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11503">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11504">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11504">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11505">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11505">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11506">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있다는 신뢰도는 낮습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11506">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11507">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11507">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11508">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11508">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11509">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11509">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11510">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11510">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11511">SSA 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11511">SSA Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11512">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11512">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11513">social security #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11513">social security #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11514">social security #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11514">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11515">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11515">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11516">Social Security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11516">Social Security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11517">Soc Sec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11517">Soc Sec</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11518">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11518">SSN</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11519">SSNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11519">SSNS</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11520">SSN #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11520">SSN#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11521">SS #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11521">SS#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11522">SSID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11522">SSID</span></span>
   
## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11523">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11523">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11524">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11524">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11525">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11525">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11526">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11526">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11527">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11527">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11528">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11528">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11529">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11530">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11530">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11531">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11532">DLP 정책은 300자 이내의 근접성으로 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보를 검색할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11532">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11533">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11533">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11534">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11534">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11535">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11535">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11536">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11536">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11537">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11537">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11538">키워드를 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 찾거나 찾은 경우</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11538">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11539">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11539">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11540">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11540">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11541">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11541">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11542">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11542">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11543">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11543">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11544">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11544">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11545">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11545">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11546">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11546">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11547">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11547">passportnumber</span></span>

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11554">우크라이나 여권 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11554">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11555">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11555">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11556">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11556">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11557">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11557">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11558">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11558">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11559">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11559">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11560">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11560">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11561">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11562">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11562">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11563">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11564">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11564">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11565">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11565">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11566">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11566">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11567">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11567">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11568">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11568">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11569">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11569">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11570">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11570">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11571">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11571">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11572">Keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11572">Keyword_ukraine_passport_domestic</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11573">우크라이나 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11573">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11574">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11574">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11576">паспорт України</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11576">паспорт України</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11577">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11577">номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11578">персональний</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11578">персональний</span></span>


## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11579">우크라이나 여권 국제</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11579">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11580">이 중요한 정보 유형은 다음에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11580">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11581">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11581">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11582">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11582">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11583">정보 거버넌스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11583">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11584">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11584">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11585">Microsoft 클라우드 앱 보안</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11585">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11586">포맷</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11587">8자 영문 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11587">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11588">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11589">8자 영문 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11589">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11590">2개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11590">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11591">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11591">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11592">체크섬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11592">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11593">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11593">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11594">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11594">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11595">DLP 정책은 다음의 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 근접성으로 검색될 수 있다는 신뢰를 중간 정도 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11595">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11596">regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 검색합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11596">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11597">검색된 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 발견됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11597">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68f3d-11604">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68f3d-11604">номер паспорта</span></span>
